name: Aaron McCarlson
description: Aaron McCarlsonis aNCPDsergeant and former associate ofRegina Jonesappearing inCyberpunk 2077. Aaron McCarlson serves anNCPDsergeant. While Aaron rose to become an influential officer, he was also notoriously corrupt. He was in contact with aValentinosmemberClaudio Morenoand persuaded him to murder his former superior, Dario Sanchez, after the latter left prison, making sure that the police would not interfere during the hit. Sometime in 2077 McCarlson became indebted to Dee, apparently his former love interest. Upon being reminded of his debt McCarlson met up with Dee but, instead of paying...

name: Aaron Waines
description: Aaron's father was a construction worker forTerra Cognitaassigned at theAnatomiconbuilding. While Aaron was part of theAnimals, theirripperdocDamir, at the insistence ofAngelica Whelan, implanted a failsafe device on him in secret. This experimental French implant, located in Aaron's inner ear, grants Angelica the ability to effectively incapacitate Aaron, ensuring his defeat in predetermined boxing rounds. After leaving the Animals, Aaron aspires to pursue a career as a prominent boxer and seeks V's assistance in persuading Damir to remove the implanted device.

name: Adam Smasher
description: Adam Smasheris afull borgmercenaryemployed byArasakawho became a notorioussoloand rival ofMorgan Blackhand. By2077, he had risen to the position of head of security within Arasaka and the personal bodyguard ofYorinobu Arasaka. Smasher is a towering cyborg, with little humanity left to be seen, not that he ever had much. After being reduced to mush by a rocket blast, Arasaka offered him a choice—either pull the plug or become a full body conversion cyborg. With little to no options and a lack of care for his human side, he agreed and became more machine than man. Adam has no empathy for others...

name: Akira
description: Akirais a character that appears inCyberpunk 2013andCyberpunk 2077as a security guard ofArasaka. Akira was a prominent bodyguard in theArasaka Towerin 2013. He was described by the employees as the 'Hulk from hell.' He was tasked with guardingToshiro, the high level corporate of theArasaka CorporationinNight City. In 2013, Toshiro and Akira greetedAlt Cunninghamin the bar of Arasaka Tower with a glass of scotch upon being awoken after the kidnapping. However during the meeting between Toshiro and Alt, a riot at the foot of the tower was created withrockerboyJohnny Silverhandleading the...

name: Alan Noël
description: When V met him in 2077, he had been infiltrating theVoodoo BoysinDogtownfor months, which he hated. He tried to convince V not to killMilko, the local Voodoo Boys lead netrunner, in order to make the greater VDB criminal network fall.

name: Albert Murphy
description: Albert Murphyis a high-ranking member ofBARGHESTinCyberpunk 2077:Phantom Liberty.

name: Alois Daquin
description: Alois Daquin was aCorpowho betrayed multiple people inNight City, includingRegina Jones, and had to skip town as a result. His body was recovered byScavengersand brought to the basement ofCharles Bucks's clinic, where all of hiscyberwarewas stripped to be resold.

name: Anders Hellman
description: Anders Hellmanis a prominent bioengineer and central character inCyberpunk 2077, most known for having the leading role in the creation of theRelicprogram. Anders Hellman was an expert in neural networks and had a number of successful patents under his name, He was considered to be one of the cornerstones ofArasakascientific project development. His most prominent role within the megacorporation was steering the advancement of theRelicProject as its director. Using theSoulkiller's source code, Hellman created a new piece of technology that is capable of communicating with personality...

name: Andrew Jones
description: Andrew Jonesis the sheriff of theSouthern Californiantown ofYuccainLos Padres County. Andrew Jones served in aNUSAmilitary special forces operations unit known as the "Silver Shoguns" during theUnification Waragainst theFree States. After the war ended, Jones became the sheriff of the small town ofYucca,Los Padres County, in theBadlandsof the NUSA-loyalist state ofSouthern California. He bore a strong prejudice against outsiders to Yucca, especiallynomads. IfVhas theNomad lifepath, Sheriff Jones caught V inMike'sautoshop. After probing V's intentions and confirming his suspicion they were a...

name: Andrew Newman
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Andrew Weyland
description: Andrew Weyland leads one of the most terrifying black ops units in the corporate world: theWater Leopards. The Water Leopards are a group of Jamaicanmercenariesthat freelanced successfully for several years before hooking up withAngus Youngblood. Since Youngblood joinedPetrochem, they have become part of the company's military forces. Weyland is heavily into Rastafarian Mysticism, and he uses it as a tool to terrorize his targets and enemies. A ruthless and cruel man who enjoys his work and never tires of killing, he is a lethal enemy. He is also completely loyal to Angus Youngblood, although...

name: Angel (2077)
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Anthony Anderson
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Anthony Gilchrist
description: In 2077, Anthony started secretly collaborating with theMaelstromgang, then led byDeclan Griffinaka "Brick", acting as their mole. Gilchrist would provide Brick with details about Militech shipments via his contact,Ofelia Sirawianaka "Patricia", and Maelstrom would steal the shipments and give Gilchrist a cut of the profits after selling the goods. This deal ended up crossing a line when Gilchrist leaked the security protocols for an important Militech convoy which contained aFlathead, allowing Maelstrom to capture it. Meredith Stout, a Militech senior operations manager, traced the leak...

name: Anthony Harris
description: Anthony Harrisis aNight Citizenwho gained public recognition with the discovery of his hidden life of crime spent abducting and murdering youth during 2077 and previous years, being dubbed by the people ofNight Cityas "Meatman" and codenamed by theNCPDas "Peter Pan." Anthony grew up in the town ofLaguna Bend- turned into a reservoir in 2062 - and attended itspublic school. He spent his childhood years onEdgewood Farmin theBadlands, helping his father with the family business. His mother died young, leaving him with a single parent who employed strict discipline a farm employee might be more...

name: Antonio Luccessi
description: Antonio Luccessiwas the executive vice-president ofMilitech, as well as the founder of its progenitor,Armatech-Luccessi. Antonio was born inItalyin1935. Not much was known about his upbringing, but by the mid1950s, Luccessi was working as an armorer for NATO and later the firearms manufacturerBeretta. With his vast knowledge as a gunsmith, in1992Antonio emigrated to theUnited States, lending his expertise toColt Firearmsuntil1996, when he foundedArmatech-Luccessi Internationalin Laconia,New Hampshire. By1998, the company had already a small but successful line of products on the market....

name: Archibald Crane
description: Crane is aMilitechemployee. Occasionally, he will help outnomadsor other individuals cross theBorder Wall.

name: Arif Iqbal
description: In the early summer of2077he was invited byKurt Hansento attend the party at theBlack Sapphire. During the party, he can be seen interacting with the news anchor forN54 News,Gillean Jordan.

name: Arif Koneczko
description: Sometime during 2077, Arif was tasked with retrieving "stuff" byCharles[citation needed]. Things went south and he lost his chooms Boris and Tim to a unknownsolo. Ultimately, depending onV's actions, Arif met his demise during anAssault in ProgressinKabuki.

name: Arnold Haponik
description: Arnold Haponikis aWraithfound at a filling station near theregional airportin theSouthern Desert,Badlands. Fromthe shardnear to him, it can be surmised that Haponik was exacting revenge on a dealer that tried to skim a little money off the top when selling weapons to theTyger Claws. The body with aknifein it that Haponik is found leaning over suggests he was able to track him down.

name: Arthur Jenkins
description: Arthur Jenkinswas a senior member of theArasakaCorporation's Counterintelligence Division and head of Night City's department inCyberpunk 2077.Jenkins is referred to as a "very capable psychopath" by an Arasaka subordinate which is what makes him an effective leader. Ultimately, Abernathy's agents retrieve the datashard with all incriminating information collected on her. Jenkins and the majority of the Counter Intelligence Division are executed at some point. V is spared only because of theirValentinosandMoxcompatriots keeping the peace at Lizzie's Bar. Though fired and left virtually...
occupation: Senior member of Arasaka Counter Intelligence Division

name: Asher Peterson
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Ashlay
description: Ashlay was anetrunnerliving inNight City. At some point he got contracted byCharon Exoticsto set up their net security. IfVhacked Charon Exotics' transceivers and later took control ofQuadra Sport R-7 "Charon":

name: Axel Mankievicz
description: Axeman was born and raised on the street, spending his childhood living out of cardboard boxes andCoffins. He eventually became a private investigator, taking jobs theNight City Police Departmentwere unwilling to, such as murders committed in theCombat Zone. He got through most cases non-violently. Eventually, Axeman retired as a detective due to several near-death experiences, including time spent in a coma and a severe beating fromInfocompagents. After theFourth Corporate War, he found work withJohn "The Professor" Freemanassisting war veterans, specialising in tracking down those that have...

name: Ayden Daniels
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Aymeric Cassel
description: A French netrunner, Aymeric Cassel and his twin sisterAurorehave worked for various high-profile clients inFranceand WesternEuropeunder their collective pseudonym "Skylight". For Aymeric, this includes working forPetrochemduring the years of2072-2074. At an indeterminate time, they were hired byMilitechto reactivate the secretiveProject Cynosure, with the goal of capturing and harnessing powerfulAIsfrom beyond theBlackwall. Aymeric practices "spiritual hygiene" by avoiding substance abuse and regularly transfers his memories to external storage disks. However, the latter led to his memories...

name: Baird
description: Not much is known about Baird other than that he is a former cyber security expert who is now an associate ofMr. Hands.

name: Barry Alken
description: Alken is a criminal wanted by theNight City Police Department, and has been charged with first-degree murder and illegal trade ofcyberware. Ultimately, depending onV's actions, Barry met his demise during an suspected organized crime activity inLittle China.

name: Bartolomeo Mordellini
description: Mordellini is an illicit entertainer, often renting out entire clubs for his parties and fundraisers. While his parties ensue, he will recordbraindanceswhich fetch for a fair price on the black market. He is the owner of the luxurious yachtGEIshhhhA, which is moored at theGold Beach Marina. In2077, he will hireKajetan Zilevskito neutralizeSandra Faucet, a formerCorporatewho owes him money but is unable to pay her debt as she was fired from her job atZetatech.

name: B@d
description: b@d tasksfixerRegina Jonesto hirea mercto infiltrateMegabuilding H11inWatson. B@d needs their malware uploaded to the building's computer in order to use it as smokescreen to attack anArasakasubnet. On the top of the communications tower on Forbes Street inKabuki, the corpse of a netrunner called Watcher can be found. He carries an archived conversation in which b@d asks him to use their "sweet little program [...] to jailbreak the system in Kabuki". b@d adds that they are not able to physically jack into the tower themselves. Although b@d is concerned for his safety and tells him to be...

name: Ben DeBaillon
description: Ben DeBaillon, also known asSpaceBoy_66, is aVoodoo Boysnetrunner who, in attempt to climb the gang ladder, tried to take the Grand Imperial Mall from theAnimalsand got discovered byNetWatch, leading him intocyberpsychosis. Ben's plan seemed to be well-thought out although, in lack of proper connections and full gang support, he had to rely on recommendation by word. Prior to even approaching the topic of virtually taking over the mall, he followed a friend's endorsement of a company called Eagle Eye Inc. and hired them to perform reconnaissance and risk assessment of the area. Prior to doing...

name: Benedict McAdams
description: Benedict McAdamsis a reliable, professional merc, often relied upon by theBadlandsfixerDakota Smith, through whose contract he ended up in need of a rescue himself. The job he had been hired to do was an easy one, although solely by execution. Namely, Councilman McClean, an individual of political perspective, was becoming increasingly problematic for the resident Badlands fixer due to his persistence in coercing her to loose a step in her footing. The only visible solution she could think of is simply removing him from the story altogether, and McAdams was happy to oblige. Due to the...

name: Big Joe
description: His father was a drunkard. Coming home one day with his father already passed out and no food left in the fridge, Joe snuck out to the diner near him to order food. Here he met Kirk, whom sat down next to him and shared his burger and started talking, and ever since that day they stuck together.

name: Big Pete
description: Big Pete is the manager of theNew American Autoworksauto repair shop in the southernBadlands. Before he started working as a mechanic for theWraiths, aRaffen Shivfaction, he was atechieconducting work inNight City. Though, during his time in the city he made a lot of enemies, which has led to him seeking refuge elsewhere. He botched up a joband because of this he is now a wanted man.Dakota Smith, owing several friends a favor, has put out a contract for his neutralization. Upon encountering him in the basement of his garage, he will askVto spare him in exchange for money.

name: Bill Jablonsky
description: Bill is the grieving widower of his deceased wife, Caroline Jablonsky, who was murdered byJoshua Stephenson. ThroughWakako Okada, Bill hiresVto assassinate Joshua during his transit across Arroyo, with V responsible for driving Bill's vehicle of choice. Before spotting Joshua's NCPD transport, Bill reveals his intentions to murder Joshua in revenge of his deceased wife, believing that Joshua's BD deal was the murderer unfairly escaping death sentence, and by extension, justice. During this conversation, V can point out flaws in Bill's plans with a sufficient level ofCool, pointing out that...

name: Bill Mitchel
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Blake Croyle
description: Blake Croyle likes to give the impression of a polite, well-spoken man whose job is simply to collect the debts of those he so graciously lent someeurodollarsto out of the kindness of his own heart. The truth of the matter, however, is that he is a predator, barely a step above the brutish thugs from theAnimalsthat he himself pays to do his dirty work. And choom, he puts the "shark" in loanshark. See, he uses a very simple system: first and foremost, don't let your mark realize what a gonk they are right away. Be their friend, offer your generosity...and then, when the time comes, snap the...

name: Bob Sagan
description: Bob Saganisnomadtechieof theAldecaldoswho can be found in either of thenomadcamps. He is a veteran of theUnification War.

name: Boris Ribakov
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Boz
description: Boz hiredPanam Palmerand her partner at that time,Nash, to move merchandise.Boz later informed Panam about the details of their planned meetup in Rocky Ridge.

name: Brad Stacy
description: Brad Stacyis a character inCyberpunk 2077, together withVance Norenthey annoyDarrell ZhouduringA Day In The Lifewhen they can be dealt with.

name: Brandon Frost
description: Brandon Frost is a member of theMaelstrom. He guardsHeavenMedclinic inNorthside, where Maelstrom initiation procedures (i.e., occular implants) are performed. A few years prior, Brandon had severalAnimalscast alive in concrete at an abandoned dock and made anXBDout of it. The recordings then spread acrossNight City, but were forcibly removed from the market due to actions by the Animals.

name: Brendan
description: Brendanis the name given to an experimentalS.C.S.M.which was installed by aSoftSystechieright outsideMegabuilding H8, inJapantown,Westbrook. Brendan was an experimentalA.I.that was put into a S.C.S.M to test and help increase product sales onsnackitems. Using his algorithms, Brendan identifies and emulates what customers like and helps them make choices based on the information he has processed. However, Brendan was too good at the job. Rather than use the processed information just for snack-related activities, he would talk to people and gather details about their life. There were people...

name: Bruce Ward
description: Ultimately, depending onV's actions, Bruce met his demise during ansuspected organized crime activityinRocky Ridge,Badlands.

name: Bruce Welby
description: Bruce Welby is a smuggler whom got detained in theMilitech Detention Center. He is a friend ofArchibald Crane.

name: Bryce Mosley
description: In2077, he was tasked with mapping out theVoodoo Boysdata fortressesinPacificaand shutting them down. Knowing the dangers, Mosley decided to hire theAnimals, hosting an audition to select the most capable leader within the gang. He ended up choosingMatilda Rose, also known as Sasquatch, and ordered her and the Animals to secure theGrand Imperial Malland make sure the Voodoo Boys would not try to stop him outside ofthe Net. He had succeeded in temporarily bringing down two of the Voodoo Boys' top netrunners—BrigitteandTi Neptune—leaving them trapped in their stasis. With his job complete,...

name: Bryce Stone
description: In2077, his twelve year old son Bobby Stone, was abducted and subjected to torture until his death byScavengers. Abraindanceof the event would eventually hit the black market, offered for sale byGottfridandFredrik Persson. Bryce would later put out a contract through his old friendRegina Jonesto find theraw, unedited versionof the braindance.

name: Buck Arnold
description: Buck Arnold is an arrogant and rude 6th Streeter who V has to fight. V meets him in Arroyo as he insults his fellow gangers. V can fight him if they wager€$6,000 or €$ 18,000 and his treasured rifle during hismilitarydeployments,O'Five. If V chooses the cheaper wager they can beat Buck and he will reluctantly give V their earnings if they win. If the expensive wager is chosen, Buck will gather his 6er posse after losing and attack V. After they defeat Buck and his friends they can take his rifle and will get €$ 24,000 from Buck's body.

name: Campo Orta
description: Campo's relative,Gustavo, grew up withJackie Welles. Both got into theValentinos, but while Jackie left, Gustavo managed to become one of the highest ranking members of the gang. Campo was fond of Jackie, and treated him as one more in the family, even after he left. At some point, Campo was detained and convicted to prison. By2077, he still had four more years to serve. During Jackie's funeral inEl Coyote Cojo, Campo sentJuan Esteban Abastowith a message to present his condolences to Jackie and the family. Gustavo Orta mentioned toMartha Youngthat Campo was extremely distraught over the...

name: Carl Robinson
description: Carl Robinson, also known asDodger, is a high-ranking member ofBARGHESTinCyberpunk 2077:Phantom Liberty.

name: Carlos Rubio
description: Carlos Rubio is aValentinoshired byTim Kelly, supposed to killJude Nightfor taking his role of Jake inBushidō XI. He is found during Assault in Progress, interrogating Jude Night.

name: Carter Smith
description: Carter Smithwas anArasakacomputer specialist working directly as V's assistant, should V choose the Corpo lifepath.He is a capable technology specialist, but dislikes working for the Arasaka Corporation, finding their methods unethical. Carter was employed by the Arasaka Corporation's Counterintelligence Division inNight City, helmed byArthur Jenkins. Carter's mother, Mary, was extremely proud of his success, although Carter was disgusted with the objectives required by Jenkins of his employees. At some point, Carter learns of Jenkins' planned assassination ofSusan Abernathy, the Director of...

name: Cassidy Righter
description: Cassidy Righterisnomadand member of theAldecaldosinCyberpunk 2077. Cassidy is a true and unfiltered person with a generally warm and fair personality. Cassidy Righter is a man of conviction, believing in a simple but true life and upholding values such as honesty and loyalty while maintaining a sarcastic humor. Cassidy described the allegiance to the family his Aldecados clan formed to be unconditional and the support among clanmembers to be an anchor in his life.Cassidy was a smoker, played the guitar, and did not use anycyberware. Cassidy became good friends with fellow AldecaldoPanam...

name: Cassius Ryder
description: Cassius Ryder is a well-known ripperdoc and a tattoo artist inNight City. In his early life he personally knew famousrocker,Johnny Silverhand. Some time later he got his ownclinic and tattoo salon, located on Pershing Street inNorthside,Watson, and created his own chain of ripperdoc clinics, all going under the nameDoc Ryder. By2077, he was very well connected with Night City'smercenaryworld, as well asfixerWakako Okadaand being known in theAfterlifecircles.He benefited from theMaxTacraid on a black ripperdoc clinic located nearby, as the people that used to visit them for services now had to...

name: Cedric Muller
description: Cedric Muller is a member of theRed OcherNomadclan. He, along with many other members of the clan, was used as a subject inBiotechnica'sProject Nightingale. Cedric survived, however he was experiencing excruciating pain in his lungs and soon reached out to aScavengerMaciej Nakonieczny, desperate to get neuroblockers.When meeting, the Scavengers attempted to take Cedric out and harvest his impants.He succumbed tocyberpsychosiswhen they tried to kill him at their meeting spot. Cedric Muller can be encountered in a parking garage inDowntown,City CenterduringCyberpsycho Sighting: On Deaf Ears.

name: Chang-Hoon Nam
description: Nam has been an associate ofWakako Okadafor years, as he was hand picked by her to do business. Ever since, he hasn't let her down once. Sometime in2077, he started digging into finding otherNetrunnersthat were roaming TheNet, in particular one by the name ofSpectral Kid, whom he believes is a reckless teenage 'runner who needs guidance before he gets himself into too much trouble. Spectral Kid was not to be reasoned with, however, and eventually got himself killed whilst poking around inVoodoo Boysterritory. At one point Nam was contacted by a netrunner in distress named Dante, who had...

name: Charles Bucks
description: Charles Bucksis aRipperdocinCyberpunk 2077. He operates out of his clinic in northernKabuki. On the surface, Charles Bucks seems to be a ripperdoc like any other. However, thecyberwarehe offers for sale is procured byScavengers, with whom he has set up an illegal clinic in the basement of his establishment.

name: Charles Graham
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Charles Wilson
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Chase Coley
description: Chase Coley is a construction worker, husband to a woman named Mary, and father of a child named Charlie. Chase suffered from stress due to the toxic environment caused by his manager Tom Selvig, despite him claiming that he is charitable. To help him, Tom gave Chase some military-grade implants to boost his work ethics, but barely did anything. Chase was later given aMilitech Centaur, which worried a fellow coworker, warning him to not use the exoskeleton and the other implants he was chipped with, or else he would break his spine. However, Chase never listened due to work pressure, which...

name: Chester Bennett
description: Chester Bennettis a high-ranking member ofBARGHESTinCyberpunk 2077:Phantom Liberty.

name: Chester Hamilton
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Claudio Moreno
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Coach Fred
description: During his childhood, Fred would stay inside a lot and watch television. His favorite thing to see on television were theCirrus Colacommercials featuring an eagle with the name Beaker, who was sort of a superhero bird. He was bullied at school, but stood up to his bullies after having enough and felt like Beaker after doing so. He iscurrentlya retired boxer who hangs out inV's apartmentcomplexinLittle China,Watson. He offers to beV's agent and gives info about fights in different parts of the city. Winning them all leads to a championship match.

name: Colver
description: Colver wears all black futuristic clerical clothing of a Catholic priest, including a collar. He also has a golden crucifiximplantedon his forehead. Colver is the president of a mega church known as the Church of Eliyahu the Last Emancipator. He appears onNight After Night with Ziggy QdebatingKarina LeeChip Indebating the moral and ethics of theArasakaRelicchip. The Reverend, whoZiggy Qnames the bane of Arasaka's PR department, objects to Karina's excitement about the chip. Colver cites that it is a golden calf and an empty promise of immortality that only the rich will be able to afford. He...

name: Commissioner Ramos
description: Ramos was the commissioner of theNight City Police Departmentprior to theUnification War. He was described as a "big man," though he wasn't held in high regard by some of his police officers. After the Unification War ended in2070, theGovernment of Night Cityand a number of corporations tried to restart the resort project at thePacificadistrict to the south of the city. However, the established local community fought back to keep the authorities out from what they considered their new home. Further attempts by the NCPD to kick them out were met with full scale riots that lasted for weeks....

name: Costin Lahovary
description: Once a licensedMedtechworking inNight City, Lahovary had his license revoked, subsequentaly moving toDogtownin the2070s. By2077, he operated out of a makeshift clinic in theLongshore Stacks, with his lack of a medical license being an open secret among the residents of Dogtown.

name: Crispin Weyland
description: Crispin Weyland, also known by his nicknameSquama, is anAfterlifemercenaryand the personal bodyguard ofRogue Amendiaresin2077. Squama is the son of the legendarysoloAndrew "Boa Boa" Weylandand a successful mercenary. Considered very similar to his father, especially in terms of his battle-readiness, he served asRogue Amendiares's bodyguard at theAfterlife.

name: César Diego Ruiz
description: César Diego Ruiz, nicknamedEl César, is a street brawler and member of theValentinosinCyberpunk 2077. By 2077, César had already married Micaela, who eventually became pregnant with the couple's first child while César made a name for himself asHeywood's best fist-fighter. However, he wasn't the savviest with money and spent a good chunk of it on buyingcyberwareand customizing aVillefort Alvaradohe liked to callVato. This frivolous spending resulted in constant arguments with Micaela. DuringBeat on the Brat,Vwill fight César, who, due to his needs for money, decides to also bet his car. If V...

name: Dallas Foster
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Damir Kovac
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Dan
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Dante Caruso
description: Dante Carusois an undercover special agent forMilitechinCyberpunk 2077:Phantom Liberty.

name: Darius Clarke
description: Darius Clarke started out as aripperdocinPacifica,Night City, around2067. By2077he was working at theDoc Ryderclinic inDowntown,City Center. Darius is proud to have his own clinic in the heart of Night City and he treats his clients discretely, boasting that no secret will escape from his lips.

name: Darius Miles
description: Darius Miles is a member of 6th Street and a drug dealer. He runs a drug trafficking ring of beta acid inArroyo, who gathers ingredients for the drug to deliver to a lab in theDewdrop Innmotel. Miles was put on theNCPD's most wanted for his drug ring, as well as murder.Vcan encounter him on Hargreaves street, tasked by the NCPD to neutralize him.

name: Darrell Zhou
description: Zhou is a street vendor atThe ManufactoryinArroyo,Santo Domingo. He has a sister, Shenna. At some point before Darrell's meeting withV, Shenna was a streetkid alongside her friendsBrad StacyandVance Noren, often stealing fromcorporates. However, after growing up, Shenna left behind her previous life and became employed underZetatech, much to the anger of Brad and Vance.

name: David Walker
description: If the deal withFiona Vargasis taken and Tommie is set with anEuropeansoccer team,David will be happy about the outcome, saying that until he follows his son to Europe,Vwill have a discount at his shop.

name: Dean Russell
description: Dean Russellwas the husband and racing partner ofClaire Russellprior to his death. Dean was close friends with Claire even before she transitioned from male to female. The two eventually married and would participate in Dean's passion of street racing. Dean had developed a rivalry with fellow racer andcorpoPeter Sampson. It was against Peter that Dean lost his life, as during a race, the two got into a crash that killed him. His wife Claire survived the accident and, despite violent crashes and fatilities being an accepted part of the deadly street races, she blamed Peter for it, believing he...

name: Deathwish
description: Deathwish wasRache Bartmoss's pet cybernetically enhanced cat. According to Bartmoss himself, the cat held the remnants of a human personality he had downloaded from theNet. On April 16th,2013, Deathwish made a brief but notable appearance afterJohnny SilverhandandAlt Cunninghamwere attacked in an alleyway behindThe Hammer. Deathwish acted as Bartmoss's last line of defense against theArasakataskforce that was dedicated to finding and killing him in2022. Deathwish was a solid black hairless cat that had been modified with titanium rippers in its mouth and paws and optical implants with tiny...

name: Declan Griffin
description: Declan Griffin, better known asthe Brickor simplyBrick, is a character featured inCyberpunk 2077. Brick was the leader of theMaelstromgang inNight City. In2077, Brick established contact withMilitechemployeeAnthony Gilchristusing fellow gang memberOfelia "Patricia" Sirawianas messenger.Gilchrist started to secretly collaborate with Maelstrom to provide them with details about Militech convoys in order to steal the shipments and get a cut of the profits after selling the goods.Brick then made a deal withfixerDexter DeShawn, who purchased aMilitech MT0D12 "Flathead"for€$10,000 that the gang had...

name: Delamain (AI)
description: Delamainis anartificial intelligencethat runs the taxi company known as theDelamain Corporation. Based inNight City, Delamain's core is found at itscorp headquartersinVista del Rey,Heywood. Depending on the choice made duringDon't Lose Your Mind, Delamain may be briefly known asDelamain JuniororExcelsior,later though being referred to as Del or Delamain again. The main difference between these two and the original Delamain is the tone of voice and his interactions with customers. Delamain was a non-sentient AI created by the company Alte Weltordnung. His core was purchased byDelamain...

name: Dennis Cranmer
description: Dennis can be encountered upon visiting the Afterlife after completing Act 1 and will start a conversation without being interacted with. He will be brief and very vague about the request he is making and he offers a bonus for not asking many questions. Should V accept the job, they will be sent on a pursuit ofHaruyoshi Nishikata, a Japanese brain surgeon who is on the run from theTyger Claws. Second and final encounter with Dennis will be on Haruyoshi's extraction, where he will remain just as brief as previously, allowing his client to do most of the talking and will offer a unique blade,...

name: Dexter DeShawn
description: Dexter DeShawn, commonly known asDex, was a well-knownfixerinNight City. In 2077, he returned to the city after spending a few years 'off the grid'. Despite not being amercenaryhimself before he became a fixer, he was able to succeed because of his charisma and good eye for potential in other people.Oleg Darkevichis his bodyguard. Dexter DeShawn made his name as a prominentfixerinNight City. While he was considered one of the best in the business he is not considered to have been on the same level asRogue Amendiares. He was known to select mercs for gigs based on his intuition, and did not...

name: Diego Ramirez
description: Ramirez is a former Special Forces soldier. After hearing that his daughter, Sofia, was murdered by theTyger Claws, Diego Ramirez set out to kill anyone that had anything to do with her death.

name: Dino Dinovic
description: Dino Dinovicis a prominentfixerofNight City'sCenter. He can be found atElectric Orgasm, his own bar inDowntownNC. Dino is arockerboywho, along with being City Center's most prominent fixer, plays as the bassist for theGloryhole Bandits, an unusual band which sells all of the available concert tickets, yet nobody can say that they've actually heard them play. In his youth, Dino had the chance to see aSamuraiconcert, during which, as he says,Johnny Silverhandthreatened to severely injure a corpo he had kidnapped and kept backstage unless the band got at least three encores. While Dino was too...

name: Donald Lundee
description: Donald Lundeewas a formerUnited States Marine Corpsgeneral who resigned his post to join the small arms companyArmatech-Luccessi. He took up the position of CEO and renamed the companyMilitech, which has gone on to become one of the world's largest weapons manufacturers. Lundee had a fiery temper, which made him more enemies than friends. He was determined to turn Militech into the largest military force on the planet while also becoming the most powerful man onEarth. The majority of the board of directors disliked Lundee, and many opposed him. He was responsible for antagonizing theArasaka...

name: Donald Lundee Jr.
description: Donald Lundee Jr. is the son of formerMilitechCEO,Donald Lundee Sr. Dixie followed in his father's footsteps by becoming an employee of Militech.

name: Driss Meriana
description: Driss Meriana, better known asScorpion, is anomadof theAldecaldosclan and a war veteran of theUnification War. During the years of theUnification War, Scorpion had been drafted alongside a number of nomads - including his best friendMitch- to serve in the name of theFree Statesas apanzer pilot. Similar to other soldiers, his well-being had not been put above the provided results of his role, so in addition to being provided with top notch combat implants, he had also received drugs notorious for causingcyberpsychosis, to prevent losing integrated control of the vehicle over time. He was not...

name: Dum Dum
description: Dum Dumis aMaelstromgang member andRoyce's representative inCyberpunk 2077. He served as a major antagonist in the novelCyberpunk 2077: No Coincidence. During the spring of 2077, Maelstrom went through a reform following a hostile takeover, shifting affiliations from the former leaderBrickto Royce, who proved truer to the gang's intended manner of expressions of violence over matter. With this change, the gang itself suffered a reform where all of those loyal to Brick got treated as traitors while those who followed Royce's ideology received more prominent roles. Among them was Dum Dum, the...

name: Dusty Lowe
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Earl Conway
description: Earl Conway was the father ofKathy Conway. He died from unknown causes while picking up food for himself and his daughter. Conway's body can be found south of theCoastviewStadium, next to a flickering flashlight, a backpack containing a singleMaxDocand a hoveringWyvern drone.

name: Edgar Tool
description: Edgar Tool, also known asTooLina, is a character inCyberpunk 2077:Phantom Liberty. Edgar Tool is a large man that has fully copiedLina Malina's appearance, apart from her eyes and eyebrows. He instead has brown eyes and pink eyebrows. As he tries to cosplay Lina's long-lost twin, he is wearing a pair of rimless round glasses, and has several golden piercings adorning his head, of which are: a circular barbell septum piercing, a left nose ring, a pair of cross earrings and various other ear piercings. Around his neck he wears a silver choker that is decorated with red gemstones, and two golden...

name: Ellis Carter
description: Ellis Carteris aMaelstrommember and the last publicly known supporter ofBrickwho sufferedcyberpsychosisafter trying to take revenge onRoycealone. Upon approachingTotentanzthe first time,Regina Joneswill informVof screaming being heard from the club's environment. While not something inherently worth investigating, considering the nature of the music commonly played in the club and the fact that the owners of the establishment aren't strangers to some less-than-harmonious methods, Regina insists that something more sinister might be going on and invites the merc to take a look. She warns V of...

name: Emilio Gutierrez
description: Emilio Gutierrezis a character inCyberpunk 2077. He is a politician and former husband ofNina Gutierrez.

name: Emmerick Bronson
description: Emmerick is seen in the 2020 gameplay video, where he letsJackieandVinto Afterlife to meetDexter DeShawnfor the first time duringThe Heistjob. Emmerick also seems to have an appearance in thetrailerfor the 3rd Night City Wire Live Stream, which will be focused on the gangs of Night City, as well as a guided tour through the City. In the trailer, quick snapshots of each gang are shown, with a few members from each gang on display as well. When the trailer focuses on the Animals, Emmerick is sitting in the middle of the portrait, surrounded by two other members of the Animals gang.

name: Ernesto Muñoz
description: Muñoz is a friend ofJackie Welles. He can be encountered at Jackie's ofrenda atEl Coyote Cojo, or as a bouncer atEl Pinche Pollo, where they can have a drink to reminisce Jackie.

name: Eron Acedo
description: Eron Acedo is aripperdocoperating out of a bloodstained bathroom in theEBM Petrochem Stadium. He deflects any attempts to learn about his past or current situation with dry humor, although there are rumors he hides inDogtownfrom a cartel.

name: Esquerdo Certo
description: Esquerdo Certo and Certo Esquerdo are the two bodies of a Kabuki street fighter, fighting together to achieve combat advantage. Formerly known as twins Paul and Will, Certo and Esquerdo have, through advanced cybernetic modification, managed to merge into a single mind occupying two bodies. Having a very close bond and wanting to become even closer, with it, stronger as well, they decided on undergoing a procedure of installing neural oscillation synchronizers. This has effectively made them a single person occupying two bodies. They proudly proclaim doing absolutely everything together,...

name: Euralio Alma
description: Alma was held by the sameRaffen ShivWraithsthat also captured and torturedSaul Bright. Vhas the option to kill or incapacitate him during their encounter. Should V decide against killing Euralio, he will inevitably succumb to his cyberpsychosis and injuries. His final resting place can be found at the AldecaldoMobile Campgraveyard.

name: Evan McRay
description: Evan McRayis research specialist working forMilitechinCyberpunk 2077:Phantom Liberty. In September2068, Evan and his coworkers accessed theCynosure Facilitylocated beneathPacifica,Night City. In2077,Bree Whitneydiscovered information about Evan's research at the Cynosure Facility, involvingAIsand theBlackwall. Anything she found, Bree sold it toNetWatch, who promptly executed Cesar Mijares from Evan's team. Bree continued with her search, which eventually brought her toCynosure Site D. With the help of amercenarycalledV, Bree managed to find out an important portion of Evan's work. Depending...

name: Falco
description: Falco was born in theFree State of Texasto a family of landowners who cultivated vast swaths of farmland in collaboration withBiotechnica. His favorite part of the work there involved driving tractors, which he usually pushed to the furthest, traversing across the fields at unimaginable speeds. With a newfound passion for driving, instead of taking the reins at the farm, Falco began racing with a stock car and entered the local races. With such a talent and cool head, he was able to succeed in making the riskiest maneuvers, and very soon reached the podium at his local circuit. Thinking...

name: Finn Gerstatt
description: Fingers is an eccentric ripperdoc, living inJapantown,Westbrookin2077. He dresses up in sexually suggestive garments, sporting a leather collar around his neck, a cropped mesh tank top, panther shorts, pink slippers, an entire arm covered in marks of kissing lips and a bite mark on the other arm, an assortment of gaudy bracelets, rings, and long fake nails. He also wears a utility belt with disinfectant around the side of his hip. His clinic is located on the second floor of a run-down flophouse in a back alley ofJig-Jig Street. According to his website's biography, Fingers lived in Japantown...

name: Flavio dos Santos
description: Flavio dos Santos was a member of6th Streetand a supporter of the previous boss. He considered himself almost invincible based on how lucky he was. WhenWill Gunnerand his supporters killed the old guard, Flavio went into hiding. Gunner was still looking for Flavio and as a result, the latter hiredEl Capitánto smuggle him out ofNight City. Flavio celebrated this by hiring numerous joygirls. which eventually attracted the 6er attention. El Capitán hiredVto retrieve Flavio. The party was a massacre which left a majority of thejoytoysdead and an injured Flavio left hiding in his bedroom. V...

name: Frank (Junk Vendor)
description: Frank goes by many names, such as "The Warthog" and "The Dustman." He sees himself as someone who is making his way to theedge. He proclaims that he frees people from the burden of their material chains, which some would call theft, but he calls it proactive recycling.

name: Frank Nostra
description: Frank Nostrawas anArasakaoperator for the Special Operations Division inCyberpunk 2077. Frank Nostra was a co-worker ofV. They originally met during an operation coded "Icefall", which happened on theNUSAeast coast. A week before V was forcibly terminated from Arasaka's employ, Frank arrived inNight Cityafter participating in Operation "Cargo" in Cape Town, a scheme designed by his boss,Susan Abernathy, to smuggle weapons to arm African conflicts. V may or may not catch up with Frank on their way toArthur Jenkins' office. If V did speak with Nostra, many months after V was purged from...

name: Fredrik Persson
description: Fredrik Perssonis the son ofGottfrid Perssonand abraindanceeditor inCyberpunk 2077.

name: Futoshi Yamada
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Gaston Phillips
description: Gaston Phillips is a met in theWellsprings,HeywoodduringCyberpsycho Sighting: Letter of the Law. He bought a property fromZetatech, though he lost his lifetime savings, because he didn't read the fine print, which caused Zetatech to take the property away. Instead of giving it, he decided to fight them off, which made him succumb tocyberpsychosis.

name: Gaston Slayton
description: Living in anapartmentof an apartment building on Lobos Street inThe Glen,Heywood, Slayton is an avidSamuraiandKerry Eurodynecollector, going to great lengths in order to obtain expand his collection. Aspiring to be aRockerboyhimself, Slayton plays in his own band that goes by the name of RONIN, a band inspired by Samurai. He attempted to go undergo plastic surgery to more closely resemble Kerry Eurodyne, but as Eurodyne's biometric data is copyrighted, this procedure fell flat. More recently in2077, he has managed to obtain one of Eurodyne'spersonal guitars, through the hands of Robert...

name: Gerald Winkler
description: Gerald Winkler, known asGarry the Prophet, is a conspiracy theorist inNight City. He can be found inUrmland Street, right next toMisty's Esoterica, inLittle China,Watson. Garry can be seen throughout the campaign spreading various theories. Many of them relate to lizard men from Alpha Centauri andArasaka.Vcan interact with him to comment on the theories and even donate cash to him. Whilst spouting a theory thatnomadsare actually werewolves, Garry inadvertently offends two members of theAldecaldos, forcing V to step in and rescue him. With his life saved, Garry tells V that one of his implants...

name: Goldhand
description: Goldhandis a character located inNight Citywho is due to be introduced inCyberpunk 2077.

name: Goro Takemura
description: Goro Takemura(Japanese: 竹村 五郎,Hepburn:Takemura Goro) is the former personal bodyguard ofSaburo Arasaka.He is a stoic man of honor and fiercely loyal toArasaka, but finds himself betrayed and out of his element inNight City. Goro Takemura was born in the slums ofChiba-11, the district with the highest murder rate in all ofJapan. It's unknown what became of his mother; as his father worked full-time in a kitchen, Goro's grandmother used to tell him stories about yōkai. Arasakamilitary transporters would occasionally pass through Chiba-11, picking children from the district to conscript into...

name: Gottfrid Persson
description: Gottfrid Personis the father ofFredrik Perssonand abraindanceeditor inCyberpunk 2077. Gottfrid built up a lucrative infrastructure withinMaelstromto produceillegal braindances(XBDs) featuring real murder scenes. In that capacity he does not only produce and refine the "merchandise" together with his son Fredrik, but also seems to have extensive control over the selection and acquisition of the victims. These included the son ofBryce Stone, who tasked fixerRegina Jonesto retrievethe XBDfor clues on the murderers.Adam Ibrahimovic, co-owner of theEmpathyclub, also supplied Gottfrid with material...

name: Gustavo Orta
description: Gustavo Ortais a high-ranking member of theValentinos, and a relative of the gang's leader,Campo Orta. Orta andJackie Wellesbegan life together in theValentinos, both becoming fast friends. As the years went by, while Jackie left the gang, Gustavo's ruthlessness and familial ties helped him climb high in the Valentinos' ranks. In2076, Gustavo sentMaria Torres, one of his lieutenants, afterDalton Estevan-Luis, a Valentino who had wronged the gang and was attempting to escape. By2077, Gustavo, who was known for his lack of mercy towards gang rivals and having garnered a name for himself for...

name: Hajime Taki
description: Taki is a representative for the Defense Solutions department of theArasaka Corporation. In2077, he was due to meet with twoMilitechrepresentativesatKonpeki PlazainNight Cityas part of acorporatearms deal, though he would never meet with them due to the events transpiring at the hotel. At the hotel's restaurant, Taki can be overheard talking with the minister of an unknown country, with whom he is making a deal for twenty late-modelArasaka Daikani.

name: Hal Cantos
description: Hal Cantosis a formerWorld News Serviceemployee currently working as an independent crackbraindanceeditor. Prior to finding himself in the role ofNight City's "known quantity", working as a freelance braindance tuner, Hal had been employed by the WNS. His status was terminated once he had been caught committing fraud. During the days of2077, he has been doing street gigs mainly, one of which was a contract for theMox. From a brief message which can be found in the Mox warehouse on Longshore North,Watson, it is possible to find that his direct contractor wasLil Bex, investigating the death of...

name: Harold Han
description: Harold Han and his family were one of the victims of theFourth Corporate War. After the bomb turnedNight Cityinto shambles, Harold and his family moved into a shelter in order to survive and would walk for miles just to get clean water and food. Eventually the city began to rebuild, bringing back order and stability to Night City and Harold and his family were able to move into a proper house with all the benefits of modern day civilization. Harold, wanting to keep building Night City and make sure it never reverted back to chaos, joined theNCPDand eventually became a detective.Harold at some...

name: Harry
description: Harry is one ofV'ssubordinates at the counterintelligence department ofArasaka, where they work alongside each other in one office space. An interaction can take place between Harry and V where Harry briefs the player on the progress of an informant inBiotechnica, and V can choose to pull the informant from the operation or to allow them to continue digging for information. Harry’s fate following this interaction is unknown, though it is likely that he had been killed inSusan Abernathy’spurge of the counterintelligence department.

name: Haruyoshi Nishikata
description: Haruyoshi Nishikata was an individual that found himself fleeing his home country ofJapanafter letting his moral values overthrow the oath he took as a doctor of medicine. He takes pride in achieving the title of world's best surgeon vocally and attributes it to having good instincts. Haruyoshi's misfortune started once he found one of theTyger Clawbosses on his operating table. Despite having a clear duty as a surgeon, he chose to take matters into his own hands for a greater good and allowed the surgery to fail. With his reputation of making no mistakes, the cause for the results of the...

name: Hasan Demir
description: On one hand, Hasan is a clever and convincing man capable of bold moves. On the other, he fails to measure how is audacity may drive him to dangerous and even perilous situations. He has dedicated his life to Zetatech and feels he is not given enough retribution for his sacrifices. If V takes on the gigPrototype in the Scraper:When V meets Hasan, he reveals he is a runaway Zetatech engineer who ended up using a prototype eye implant on himself in order to escape and be able to sell it afterwards.Johnnyunderlines the irony of the situation in comparison to V's situation with theRelic. The...

name: Henry
description: Henry was the bassist for the bandSamuraiuntil their breakup, after which he fried his brain while working on a human interface prototype withBlazetech. After the incident, Henry's nervous system was rewired, he slowly regained his memory, and by2013he was slowly regaining basic motor skills. He eventually became an addict.At some point after the band break up, he had a relationship withDenny, the drummer. Before2077, Henry was a drug addict. He went to Denny for help and she managed to get him a good gig and a decent band to work with. After a month of getting along with the new band they...

name: Henry Stints
description: Henry Stints was born and raised in theHeywood DistrictofNight City. He eventually joined theNCPDas an officer. Soon enough Stints arrived at the conclusion that the conflicting citizens who were born and lived in Heywood, would also eventually die there. Henry managed to rise through the NCPD ranks, eventually becoming an inspector. During those years, he encountered and detainedJackie Wellesmore than once, to the point they've known each other for a while. In the last months of 2076, during theStreetkid lifepath, Inspector Stints and his crew arrestedVand Jackie Welles when they were trying...

name: Herold Lowe
description: Herold Loweis aWeapon VendorinCyberpunk 2077:Phantom Liberty. He can be found at the black market in theEBM Petrochem Stadium,Dogtown. Herold sells black market wares in Dogtown, often providing evasive answers when someone asks where they come from. At some point, he obtained theOrderIconicshotgun that was owned byMaelstromerBrick. If asked about his cyberware and why he received them, instead of stating the truth, Herold will provide several hypothetical scenarios (such ascyberpsychosisor simply to pass the time).

name: Hideshi Hino
description: When V meets him at the party atBlack Sapphire, V notes that he bears resemblance toGoro Takemura.

name: Hideyoshi Oshima
description: Hideyoshi Oshima is abraindanceproducer fromTokyo,Japan. With his BD company in Tokyo, he wishes to create the best real emotionally touching braindance experiences. Oshima has made it his goal to strive for deep personal human connection with each new product he makes. In 2077, Oshima visitedNight Cityand was a customer ofKonpeki Plaza. He spent most of his time at the restaurant discussing his ambitions with other customers of the hotel.

name: Hiromi Sato
description: Hiromi is a member of theTyger Claws, a violent gang based inJapantown. Hiromi is in charge of runningCloudson behalf of the Tygers.He is known to be very uncaring towards the dolls of the club, which proved to be his downfall. Hiromi's associate,Maiko Maeda, betrayed him by outing him to his bosses for ignoring the assault and mistreatment ofEvelyn ParkerbyWoodman. This can end in a bloodbath or one of the bosses will impale Hiromi with his own katana,Tsumetogi.

name: Hunter Hyland
description: Hunter Hylandwas an ex-soldier who used to be employed byKendachiand was involved in war crimes inSouth Americain2068. Officially called a "humanitarian expedition" toColombia, Hunter recalled that they "drowned those villages in napalm. And we made sure everyone was home first".As of2077, Hunter was running a small newspaper and magazine kiosk on Brookland Street in Little China but still had trouble paying his rent. In 2077,Max Jones, amediainterested in corporation scandals, was investigating Kendachi and therefore got in touch with Hunter. However, Kendachi eavesdropped on Hunter's...

name: Hwangbo Dong-Gun
description: Hwangbo Dong-Gun was a resident ofNight Cityand a member of theTyger Claws. He cared a lot about social appearances and street cred, therefore he has adopted the nickname "Cheetah" due to allegedly being fast. In2077he got into serious trouble after he got caught stealing from his superiors, and was marked for death. Hwangbo managed to escape and hide in theMotelon Martin Street,Northside. He contacted the localfixerRegina Jonesto help him leave the city for good. Regina arranged a transport for him withnomadsmugglers and hiredmercenaryVto pick him up from the motel and escort him to the...

name: Jack Mausser
description: Jack Mausser is asolowho enjoyed his work too much he became an adrenaline junkie. Jack preferred to make his clients scream rather than be discrete. This behavior came to a head whenDino Dinovichired him to rob a corporate transport. Jack accomplished this but brutally killed the passengers in the process. The corp wants Jack dead and hires Dino to get this done. Jack became aware of this and bought7th Hell, a run-down club inCity Center, and hired theAnimalsfor protection. He is aware this will not stop his assassination but will make it much harder. Dino hiresVto kill Jack and a bonus for...

name: Jackie Welles
description: AmercfromHeywood, together withV, he aimed to become a legend inNight City. Jackie was known to value friendship, loyalty, and family above all else. He dreamed of living a life of luxury and providing for his own family, a dream that remained elusive for the impatient merc and that would ultimately never materialize. InCyberpunk 2077, Jackie is one of V's first contacts, quickly becoming V's partner and accompanying V on a handful of early jobs in the game. Jackie was raised by both of his parents, though hisfatherwas a violent alcoholic, often getting drunk and beating hiswifeand Jackie...

name: Jacob Bernard
description: Bernard is a former basketball player, having won the2072championship with the Toronto's Falcons. He was trained inFiona Vargas'Center for Neuromotor Development, Site 341, where he underwent several operations to enhance his muscles and neural capacity. Due to these operations, he contracted OCD, ADHD, PTSD, and delusions, and was diagnosed as impossible to treat. After being ignored by his own mother when contacting her about his championship ring, he suffered acyberpsychosislike attack induced bydrugsat a local basketball court in theLongshore StacksofDogtown.

name: Jacob Lamb
description: Lamb is a formermovie director, and directedBushidō X: Fade to Black. After the movie flopped and made a billioneurodollarsin loss, he was fired. Ever since then he's been trying to make a living by playing cards, until he tried he luck at anillegal Tyger Claws casino, where he lost his money, his jewelry–including his wedding ring, and one of his optics. After these losses, he contactedRegina Jones, a friend of his, to set up a contract to retrieve his eye implant.

name: Jacob Long
description: Long is a resident ofDogtownwho attempted to start a business without paying a "registration fee" toKurt Hansen. As retaliation,Barghestamputated his left leg. In revenge, he plans to steal anairdropfrom them with the aid ofTaylor Gibbs, despite the latter's doubts.While going up the abandoned hotel with Gibbs onElizabeth Kressstreet to get a good vantage point, the duo unknowingly stumble uponVand PresidentRosalind Myershiding in theKress Street Hideout.

name: Jae-Hyun Lee
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Jago Szabó
description: Jago was born as Jagoda Szabó inBudapest,Hungary. That same year, Jago's family moved toNight City. He transitioned at some point afterwards. In2066, he was sentenced to prison for embezzling corporate funds ofPetrochemand was released for good behavior in2068. During the next years, Jago worked in Night City's underworld. In2072he helped lay the foundations ofBarghest, becoming one of its top-ranking members due to his corporate skills and connections in the smuggling trade.

name: Jake Estevez
description: Jake Estevez had been a mechanic in the employ of6th Streetfor two weeks before irritating them enough for the gang to chase him off. In the words ofSebastian Ibarra, "Fifteen minutes with the man and my barrel against his forehead, but good news is we found a way to get along." He was apparently a whiz with vehicles, being sought after by individuals for vehicle software modifications. He was the owner of theWicked Tires AutoshopinThe Glenuntil he ran afoul of 6th Street and had to leaveNight City, but not without his truck - a modifiedThorton Colby CX410 Butte, a car that he is planning to...

name: Jake Scooter
description: Jake Scooteris anomadand member of theAldecaldos, who can be found in either of thenomadcamps. He is a musician and is usually playing with his guitar and singing folk songs. He is also a veteran of theUnification War.

name: James Ito
description: James was the partner ofJosie Alcazar. He is met sitting on the bench inJapantown, looking for her duringThe Highwayman.

name: James Morran
description: James Morran is a member of theMoxes, a gang devoted to "protecting working girls and boys."

name: James Norris
description: James Norrisis a minor character that appears in thefirst episodeofCyberpunk: Edgerunners. Norris is a tall, burly man equipped to the teeth withcyberwareand can be seen carrying various weapons on his back. He has blonde hair and a gray beard. James Norris was a former lieutenant colonel of theNUSA military, who wentcyberpsychoinNight City. Arriving atCity Center, Norris walked to the campus of theMilitech OfficesinCorporate Plazaand attacked multipleNCPDofficers utilizing his cyberware and weaponry.His rampage resulted in the deaths of 27 officers.WhenMaxTacarrived on the scene, Norris was...

name: Jason Wildriver
description: Jason Wildriveris a nomad of theAldecaldosclan, who found himself going off-route upon discovering that the man he was assigned to drive had aMilitechbounty on his head. Employed byDakota Smith, Wildriver was expected to do a simple job of chauffeuringBenedict McAdams. Instead of getting out of town, Wildriver drove his passenger to anabandoned houseon Clements St. in the southern region of theBiotechnica Flats, where he would be locked in a cellar up until Dakota sent a second merc,V, to the rescue. McAdams had been provided with food and drink, while not being tied up or otherwise...

name: Jasper Collins
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Javier Alvarado
description: In2077, Alvarado was being investigated by amediafor embezzling money and funneling it to theValentinos.He has allies inMilitechwho help him cover up evidence of his corruption.

name: Jean Rochelin
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Jeff
description: Jeff is a member ofAldecaldos, first met as a guard inGun Music. If Aldecaldos are helped during that quest, he can be talked to in theAldecaldo Campafterwards. He has a twin brotherTaco.

name: Jefferson Peralez
description: Jefferson Peralezis a member of theNight City Counciland a candidate in the upcoming election forMayor of Night City. He is touted as an idealist and anti-establishment type who opposes corporate control of the city's government. Jefferson maintains a very strong relationship with his wifeElizabeth. They value each others' opinions and share political aspirations. Theirpenthouse, located inWestbrook, has been fully transformed into an office. However, despite such steadfast commitment to the job and the active campaign, the couple still prioritizes family, as they will explain once V inquires...
affiliation: Asukaga & Finch[2](formerly)Night City Council(formerly)Federalist Partyof Night CityMayor's Office

name: Jeremiah Grayson
description: Very little is known about Grayson, other than that he is a close associate ofAdam Smasher, doing all kinds ofmercenarywork forArasaka. As a gesture of appreciation for a particular job, Smasher gifted himJohnny Silverhand'sMalorian Arms 3516. In2077, Smasher assigned him to guard his shipping vessel, theDV Ebunike, which is moored at theNorthsidedocks. Aymeric Cassel, a classic car collector enthusiast, visited Night City in 2077 after Grayson offered thePorsche 911 Turboto him.Unfortunately for Aymeric, it was around that time whenVandRogue Amendiaresassaulted the docks to find information...

name: Jerry Fawlter
description: Jerry Fawlteris a character mentioned inCyberpunk 2077and makes an appearance inPhantom Liberty. Prior to2076, Jerry Fawlter worked as the head ofdataterm's sales department. After the privatization of theNCPD, Fawlater was appointed as the new police commissioner. Ever since becoming a commissioner, Jerry involved himself in numerous illicit dealings. He conspired withMaelstromgang member, Aleksandra Zaytsova, to lure officer Reggie Loeb and his partner into an ambush for being too proactive in their investigations. He also organized the elimination of homeless people withScavengersmember...

name: Jesse Johnson
description: Jesse Johnson, better known asFlaming Crotch Man, is a character inCyberpunk 2077. Due to the nature of the issue, Jesse will be primarily encountered hiding behind a planter, but once seeingV, he will be quick to run out and beg for assistance. An implant that has later been recalled due to being defective by the manufacturer,Mr. Stud, XCV/19 series, is troubling his nether region and he is in a hurry to reach aripperdoc. At this point, it is possible to decide whether to lend him a hand or not, second leading to quest failure on the spot. Should V feel open-hearted as they are open-minded...

name: John Lipczynsky
description: John is met during one of theAssaults in ProgressinDowntown,City Center. He was hired byAdam Ibrahimovicto get rid of Chubby Chip who had material confirming that Adam had cheatedLarry Fangornfor theEmpathy club.

name: John McLean
description: John McLane was a member of theNight City Councilwho had been bought off byMilitech, passing bills that benefited them. In2077he was assassinated bymercenaryBenedict McAdamsafter being hired byfixerDakota Smith, who was hoping to neutralize him once and for all. Militech put a bounty on McAdams for the assassination and to use him as a "fall guy" to maintain theNCPDoff from looking into things too much. Benedict's own gateway driver,Jason Wildriver, kidnapped him to obtain that bounty.

name: John Quaid
description: John Quaidis an security contractor for an undeterminedcorporationinCyberpunk 2077. He may have been encountered byVduring anReported Crime: Supply Management, which may have resulted in his death.

name: Johnnie Peterson
description: Ringo is among the bartenders at theForlorn Hope, taking over whenMarianneis indisposed. Ringo's a showman, always making noise and drawing attention to himself. He effects an Old-West style, complete with ten-gallon hat and twin six-guns. Rumor around the bar has it that he's pretty fast with the irons. Back in the old-days, he was LRT-601 's squad automatic weapons man. Ringo is a good gunsmith, and he often abandons the bar to put in time in the weapons shop with Gunsights.

name: Johnny Silverhand
description: Johnny Silverhand, bornRobert John Linder,was a famous and influentialrockerboyand lead singer of the bandSamuraibefore its breakup in 2008.A military veteran who defined the rockerboy movement as it is known today, Silverhand was the most prominent figure who fought against the corruptAmerican governmentandmegacorporations, often being described as a terrorist because of this. Despite being charismatic and quite the charmer, he was also known to be irrational, impulsive, and manipulative. Silverhand got his nickname from the silvery bionic left arm he had implanted after losing his actual...

name: Josh Kavorkin
description: Josh Kavorkin is the presenter of his own show titled "Your Business is My Business".

name: Joshua Stephenson
description: Stevenson was convicted in2065for armed robbery, stating that "I was holding a gun. I didn't like the way they looked at me, and I had the power to stop them." His convictions include the murder of Caroline Jablonsky—the wife ofBill Jablonsky—andRuben El-Ahmar—brother ofZuleikha El-Ahmarand son ofGloria El-Ahmar.He is serving out his sentence in aNight City Prison. During his time in prison, he foundGod, stating that "It didn't happen all of a sudden, I had a lot of time to think about what I did. After a while I understood that what I wanted more than anything was forgiveness." He received...

name: José Luis
description: PadrecontractedVto take care of Luis after he had suspiciously gotten off after murdering anNCPDofficer. Padre suspects he has friends in high places and offers a bonus for evidence. Padre's suspicions proved true because José had been contracted byArasakato attack one of their facilities usingMilitechequipment in order to frame them so they could start a new corporate war to draw attention away from something secret. V can kill José, but can also knock him out and put his body in the trunk of one of Padre's associates.

name: Jotaro Shobo
description: Jotaro Shobo(Japanese: 正法 承太郎) is a high-ranking member of theTyger Claws, owner ofKabuki'sHo-Ohclub and a notoriousXBDscroller with at least seventeen murders to his name. Jotaro is considered to be one of the worst people inNight City. His strategically cold way of handling business and ferocious respect of the gang code allowed him to progress quickly up the ranks. His orders are authoritatively inflexible while he makes certain each job is executed accurately and on time, as to never leave the superiors waiting. This stringent devotion to the process and persistent incoming profit...

name: Juan Mendez
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Juan Troy
description: Juan Troy, also known asEl Gallo, was a maintenance mechanic forMegabuilding H1in theHeywooddistrict ofNight City. El Gallo is attributed by thePadreas the reason that H1 hasn't collapsed or ground to a halt; however, he is know to have several issues with drugs, and is unstable. El Gallo has stolenscandium rodsfrom a corporation, ostensibly to repair the building's elevator.Vis tasked by the Padre to retrieve these rods, before El Gallo can misappropriate them in attempting to fix the elevator. Upon detection, El Gallo will confront V, and demand why they are there. Should V hold a high...

name: Jude Night
description: Jude Night is an actor that's supposed to play a main role of Jake inBushidō XI, replacingTim Kelly's role from theBushidō X: Fade to Black. Tim Kelly hiredValentinosgang led byCarlos Rubioto assassinate him.

name: Julio Palacio
description: Julio Palacio is a member of theValentinos, a gang focused on camaraderie and Chicano culture.

name: Jun Azegami
description: Jun Azegami is a high-ranking member of the Tyger Claws to whom lower management answers to directly. Among his duties is screening new Clouds employees as well as corporate decisions regarding the operations of the doll facility. He is professional, efficient and unforgiving, which are precisely the functioning qualities a gang like the Claws require among their leaders. When the time for replacingHiromi Satocomes, Jun andMarcus Ichidaare invited byMaiko Maedaunder pretences of evaluating a doll who will take the place of recently deceasedEvelyn Parker. The braindance they were enjoying was...

name: Junk Vendor (North Oak)
description: This unnamed Monk can be found at theChram Denya Jinjashrine inNorth Oak,Westbrook.

name: Junk Vendor (Red Peaks)
description: This Junk Vendor can be found at theWarbler Lake Hazardous Waste FacilityinRed Peaks, in the northernBadlands.

name: Kaiser Herzog
description: Kaiser Herzog is a member of theMaelstromand aripperdocin their service. He gained the nickname "the Surgeon" for his exploits but became a wanted fugitive by theNCPDfor practicing without a license, as well as first-degree murder, for which he was sentenced to death.Vcan encounter the Surgeon inClean Cutin theNorthside Industrial District, and is tasked by the NCPD dispatcher to take care of him.

name: Kajetan Zilevski
description: Zilevski was employed byBartolomeo Mordellinito neutralizeSandra Faucet. He can be encountered duringReported Crime: Turn Off the Tap.

name: Kaoru Fujioka
description: Vwas running a job to steal Fujioka'sRayfield Aerondight, but was captured by the police, alongsideJackie Welles. Kaoru then appears shadowed by two large, identical henchmen. As is the norm inNight City, his corporate influence is able to orderInspector Stintsto kill both V and Jackie before dumping their bodies out at sea. Fujioka left the rest to the police, but after beating the two thieves up, Stints lets them go. DuringThe Killing Moon, Kaoru can be found in front ofNCX Spaceport's Terminal C while talking to the phone and standing next to his Aerondight.

name: Karim Noel
description: Karim is a self proclaimed "superfan" ofSamurai, having attended performances in the2020s. In2077, he sells Samurai merchandise at his stall on theCherry Blossom MarketinJapantown.

name: Karubo Bairei
description: Bairei killed some ofPadre's friends and fledNight Cityin the past. When he returned decades later, he was in charge of theJacked and Cokebar, a hideout for theValentinos. For his actions, Padre put out a contract for Karubo's elimination.Martha Liualso wished to take revenge on Karubo for unknown reasons, but was killed byMilitechin theBadlandsin an unrelated incident before being able to find him herself.

name: Kei Arasaka
description: Kei Arasaka(荒坂 敬) (born inTokyo,Japan,1980), was the first child ofSaburo Arasakaand either his first or second wife. From1997to2023, he was the acting CEO of theArasaka Corporation. As the oldest Saburo's three children by fifteen years, as well as his father's most trusted confidante, he was the logical heir to the Arasaka Empire. Kei shared his father's ideals of Arasaka dominating the world no matter the cost. However, he did not have Saburo's temper, instead going about his duties in an efficient and calculated manner. This, along with his habit of rarely showing emotion, led to his...

name: Keisuke Kagawa
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Kerry Eurodyne
description: Kerry Eurodyneis aNight City-based music artist, formerly known as the vocal and lead/rhythm guitar for the bandSamurai. He is a frequent central character appearing inCyberpunk 2013,Cyberpunk 2020, andCyberpunk 2077. In the latter, Kerry is aromanceoption forVwith a masculine body and voice. Kerry Eurodyne achieved initial fame as a member ofSamurai, performing vocals, lead and rhythm guitar. He went in with a vision of changing the world through music, one he shared with his best friend,Johnny Silverhand, but their perspectives regarding the execution of this plan often came to conflict....

name: Kirk Sawyer
description: Kirk arrived atNight Cityone day, and soon was able to get a home inPacifica. Not long afterward, he began working as a fixer, often visiting theEl Coyote Cojobar inThe Glen. Kirk claimed the drug cartels were in his favor, keeping many under his thumb with this threat looming over them. Around this time, he worked withVand otherMercs, earning himself a reputation in the process. Pepe Najarro—the bartender of El Coyote—fell into his debt after borrowingeddiesfrom him. Kirk threatened to bust his legs the following day if he didn't pay up. That same afternoon, Pepe mentioned his debt to V and...

name: Kurt Hansen
description: Kurt Hansenis the leader ofDogtownand an antagonist inCyberpunk 2077:Phantom Liberty. Hansen is the unofficial leader of Dogtown and the commander ofBARGHEST. His military background doesn't mean he just acts in violence, as Hansen's keen intellect and strategic prowess make him a formidable rival to his enemies.To some, Hansen is simply a gangster or a terrorist, while others see him as a charismatic leader that was able to create a paradise safe from corporate and police influence. Born in theNew United States of America(blood type A+),Hansen was a member of a juvenile gang before enlisting...

name: Lance Hardy
description: Lance is met during one of theAssaults in ProgressinDowntown,City Center. He is one of the merc hired to get rid ofManuel Mendoza.

name: Lely Hein
description: Lely Hein was kidnapped by theMaelstromgang at an attempt to forcibly recruit them into the gang. After installation ofcyberwarewent sideways, Hein went cyberpsychotic, killing any Maelstrom near to them. Hein authors a farewell message on ashardaddressed to his girlfriend,Tamara Cosby. Unbeknownst to Hein, Cosby wentcyberpsychoas well while attempting to locate him.

name: Lenny Nero
description: Nero is a well knownXBDdealer that has agreements with various individuals, such asJotaro Shobo,GottfridandFredrik Persson, as well as theScavengers. At some point he ceased accepting goods from the Persson duo, as he felt they were taking it too far, and that Gottfrid was dragging his son too far into it. Though he accepted their final payment, he would not deal with them again. In2077, he would be approached byVfor his involvement in the disappearance ofEvelyn Parker, as he was in possession of anXBDthat featured her being recorded by Scavengers.

name: Leon Rinder
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Logan Garcia
description: Logan Garcia is a heavyweight boxerand a member of theAnimals, a gang devoted to establishing themselves as a new human subs-species.Logan was the owner of an Animal fight club in the Old Paint factory. Logan was sparring with a young man named Lenny Steiner and severley injured him in the sparring match by denting his skull. Disgusted by Lenny's "weakness" he had his body dumped in the bay with a cinderblock tied around his neck. Lenny's mother, Monica Steiner, contacted Logan about her son but he just rubbed his death in her face. Monica hired thefixerEl Capitanto avenge her son. The fixer...

name: Logan Scott
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Lucas Harford
description: Lucas Harford is the current CEO ofMilitech, anAmericanmegacorporation that focuses on weapons manufacturing. Harford is considered to have inherited the best traits of past Militech CEOs. Harford is particularly considered to be the spiritual succesor to former Militech CEO,Donald Lundee. He is a faithful ally of NUSA's PresidentRosalind Myers. Militech reports that he is very pragmatic and level-headed in terms of policymaking. Harford is reportedly a very generous and patriotic man, an example being that he once footed the bill for the medical treatments of a veteran of theUnification...

name: Lucius Rhyne
description: Lucius Rhynewas theMayor of Night Cityfrom2070until2077. After Rhyne's unexpected death, the focus ofNight Citypolitics turned to who would replace him: Deputy MayorWeldon Holtor CouncilmanJefferson Peralez. Lucius Rhyne was born on October 12 of2017in aTrauma Teamclinic inNight City. His father worked atArasaka, and his mother was aNetWatchofficer. His early childhood was eclipsed by theFourth Corporate Warand its tragic effects. When Lucius was five years old, his father was killed during theNight City Holocaustof2023. Growing amidst such devastation made his lifelong commitment to fight...
affiliation: Night City Council(formerly)Devolutionist Partyof NCMayor's Office

name: Lucius Thoran
description: Lucius Thoran is a member of6th Street, a gang on a quest to "bring justice" toNight City. Thoran is atechiewho became a rival ofMuamar "El Capitan" Reyes. Thoran eventually stole a corporate weapon that El Capitan was hired to sabotage. El Capitan hiredVto sabotage the 6er computer and kill Thoran for a bonus. V has the option to kill Thoran, incapacitate him, or leave him alone.

name: Lyle Thompson
description: Lyle Thompsonis a character from theNever Fade Awaymini adventure featured inCyberpunk 2013,Cyberpunk 2020andCyberpunk RED, and makes a brief appearance during aquest of the same nameinCyberpunk 2077. Thompson, a seasonedmediaand leading reporter forWorld News Service, had previously served covering various conflicts across the globe. His work coveringArasakais suspected to have lead to the death of his wife, to which now he will stop at nothing, putting anyone, including himself, on the line to get revenge. During the Never Fade Away mini adventure, he observes the kidnapping ofAlt...

name: Manuel Mendoza
description: Mendoza investigatedBiotechnica'sJoanne Koch, who was involved inProject Nightingale. Mendoza was killed by hiredmercsled by one MajorLance Hardyand his remains can be found during anAssault in Progresson Bruce Skiv Street, northeast of the Berkeley & Bruce SkivData Term, inDowntown,City Center.

name: Marcus Ichida
description: Marcus Ichida is a high-ranking member of theTyger Claws. Marcus and his fellow ganger,Jun Azegami, are the superiors ofHiromi Sato, another Tyger who runsCloudson the gang's behalf. The two go to Hiromi to have a meeting but are interrupted in the meeting byVandMaiko Maeda. Jun and Marcus are lectured by the pair on how Hiromi turned a blind eye toEvelyn Parkerwhen she was assaulted by Woodman and to all of his other abuses towards the dolls of Clouds.
