This can end in a bloodbath where Marcus is killed or Jun will impale Hiromi with a katana out of disgust. They can then parts ways with...

name: Marlon Fuscino
description: His daughter was killed by high-rankingKiroshiemployeeTucker Albachin a car accident at some point in2077. To avenge her death, Marlon contactedPadreto contract an assassin to eliminateAlbachfor her crime, payingwhomeverwould be ready to pull the trigger. Because of the threats he made towards Albach in an e-mail message, Albach forwarded the e-mail to theNCPDand she herself moved to a hideout with higher security precautions.

name: Marty Jenklow
description: Marty Jenklowis a gas station owner, weapon vendor, and amateur writer at theFuel StationalongHighway 101, in the southernBadlands.

name: Mateo Thiago
description: Mateo Thiagois amoxworking as a bartender atLizzie's BarwithinNight City's sub-district ofKabuki. Whether a resident or tourist, one may easily perceive that tending a bar in Night City, in the most densely-populated of its districts, is not quite for the faint-hearted. To withstand such adversity, an abundance of character, nerves of steel and a broad understanding of the night life psychology is mandatory. Sprinkle that with a shimmering layer of charisma and you have Mateo Thiago. For all intended purpose, at least the side he'd allow to show. Maintaining customer relations on a rather...

name: Matt Dodges
description: Matt Dodges is a member of6th Street, a gang on a quest to "bring justice" toNight City.

name: Matt Liaw
description: Liaw is a formercorpowho worked forMilitechand later became amercworking for Mercenary Solutions Inc. During his time at Militech, he was deployed during theSecond Central American War, where he stepped onto a mine in Panama. After being laid off, he also lost his health insurancy policy PTSD SHIELD. Later, he would also be evicted by the Bank of Night City from his apartment on 12 Milagro Terrace after repeatedly not meeting payments. Withouteddiesand without a roof over his head and still having obsolete cyberware installed, he started the early stages ofcyberpsychosis. In a desperate...

name: Max Jones
description: Max specialized in the unveiling of corporation scandals. One story involved a veteran namedHunter Hyland, who was involved in war crimes committed byKendachiinSouth Americain2068.However, Kendachi eavesdropped on Hyland's communication with Max and eventually hired theTyger Clawsto kill the veteran. While investigating the war veteran programme "In Blood We Serve", Max had received an anonymous tip that the entire campaign was not in fact based on helping veterans but receiving publicity. The help that the soldiers have received in form of high qualitycyberware, was only on a six-month...

name: Maximum Mike
description: By listening to Mike himself, it is possible to pick up on a few details regarding his life, which cannot quite amount to biographical matter but add value to the history he's been through and his current way of life. For his way of talking about past events, Mike was present around Night City during theFourth Corporate War. Among other things, he will state that he lived in one of the firstmegabuildingsever to be built inWatson. He also appears to enjoy the visual arts, exclaiming his love forKlimtin particular, although believes that anything displayed in museums is a forgery due to real...

name: Mbole Ebunike
description: Mbole Ebunike, previously known asJudson Freeman, is a character in theCyberpunkuniverse. Judson Freeman was elected the mayor ofNight Cityin2012, after the infamousMob Warof the previous years. He had been groomed to become a well-behaved puppet of thecorporations, and acted according to their will. As such, he was a favorite among them, and with their support, Judson managed to win the reelection of2016. This time, however, the mayor had become rather intransigent, very different to how he was during his first term. Judson was tired of being a simple puppet, and during his second term, he...

name: Meds Vendor (Arroyo)
description: His store can be found atThe Manufactoryon Brandon Street inArroyo,Santo Domingo.

name: Meds Vendor (Northside)
description: Meds Vendor (Northside)is the operator of aMedpointcalledMeds Etc.inCyberpunk 2077.

name: Meds Vendor (Wellsprings)
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Michael Galleck
description: Mike Galleck was anetrunnerand a friend ofTed Collins. At some point he rentedUnit 1242at theMotelon Martin Street,Northside, and converted it into his hideout and netrunning den. In2077Mike was supposed to lay low after a gig he did for Collins. However, he soon received an offer of good pay in exchange for help in a job, which involved digging up dirt on an unnamedcouncilmember. Mike later had an argument about it with Ted, as he was worried for the netrunner's safety. However, their call got cut short when somebody arrived at Mike's hideout.That day he disappeared without a trace and his...

name: Michael Maldonado
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Michael Marcinkowsky
description: Michael Marcinkowskyis a character inCyberpunk 2077. Mike can be found at thePoppy Farmin theBadlands, where he appears to be guarding a stash of equipment that the Wraiths were about to smuggle across the border.

name: Michał Kiciński (Junk Vendor)
description: AsVapproaches Michał and his business partnerMarcin Iwiński, the player can eavesdrop on Michał's telling Marcin about his plan to take out a loan in order to expand their business beyond the confines ofEBM Petrochem Stadiumand create a company merging video games andBraindance. If V walks up to Michał, he will cut the conversation short and accidentally bang his head against the ceiling of his van as he attempts to sit down.

name: Mickey
description: Mickey wears a black and greenSpirit Animal hoodiealong with black riding pants and white high-tops. His goldEMP Threadingis the only visiblecyberwarehe has. Mickey usually carries two guns with him,DR-12 QuasarandM-10AF Lexington, and drives a yellowBrennan Apollo. Mickey was atechieand a mechanic working withSanto Domingo'slocalfixer,Muamar "El Capitán" Reyes. He took care of vechicles delivered bymercenaryVfor the clients ofAUTOFIXER,and delivered theAutofixer's Discount Extravaganzzzatickets for the winners of the races organized byJim Jarry. Mickey also took care of the medical equipment...

name: Miguel Rodriguez
description: Miguel Rodriguez, also known as "Gizmo", is a leader of theValentinosinCyberpunk 2077. Miguel can be encountered during aSuspected Organized Crime ActivityatMercado Sonoraon Pigeon Street and Martin Luther King Boulevard inVista del Rey,Heywood.

name: Mike Kowalski
description: Raised on the streets ofNight City, Mike joined theTyger Clawswhen he was 11 years old. By the time he was 12, he was already dealing for them. At the age of 15, he left the Tyger Claws to make a name for himself by doing gigs for various fixers. In2076, he had a short relationship withChristine Markov, the owner of a market stand atCherry Blossom Market. At some point in 2077, his elbow joints were repaired byCharles Bucksand he took on a gig fromRegina Jonesto steal secretMilitechdata fromIsis Sothos's computer under the folder name "Tenebris".Mike gets captured but Regina hiresVto free him.

name: Mike Kowalsky
description: In2077, Mike Kowalsky was engaged in a shootout with theNCPDat Warehouse #344 on the intersection of Cartwright and Muren street inLittle China,Watson.

name: Mike (Yucca mechanic)
description: Mikeis a mechanic and the owner of theYucca Car Repair ShopinYuccainCyberpunk 2077. IfVhas theNomad lifepath, they are forced to stop inYuccawhen theircarbreaks down on the way toNight City. Mike sneaks V inside his repair shop to fix their car, promising it will be a quick job, but soon finds the car will need more extensive repairs. In a rush, V bypasses the car's broken coupling to hotwire the car long enough to reach Night City. Mike grudgingly agrees that fix will suffice, but remarks it is inelegant and will not last long. Before V can leave, the local sheriff,Andrew Jones, arrives and...

name: Mikhail Akulov
description: Mikhail Sergeievich Akulov(Михаил Сергеевич Акулов) is afixerof theSoviet Unionwho travels toNight Cityin2077. Mikhail Akulov rose to fame as the topfixerin theSoviet Union. He traveled toNight Cityin 2077 under the pretext of a diplomatic business trip, but he was rumored to have been seduced by the freedom and capitalism the city brings. Neither story turned out to be true. Instead, Akulov's arrival in Night City was related to the Soviet Union andChinacompeting to secure a major arms deal withArasakathat would put the losing country at a severe military disadvantage. The secretary general...

name: Milko Alexis
description: Perhaps due to his fixation with netrunning, Milko's physical body is gaunt and sickly. He has featureless white eyes with dark circles around them which remain open even as he runs theNet. Milko is aNetrunnerof some standing within theVoodoo Boysgang; he belongs to the faction of Voodoo Boys that resides inDogtownand controls part of theLuxor Heightslocale. Milko is well known for a specific method of blackmailing in which he threatens to fatally damage the implants and synthetic organs of his victims using a net attack unless they comply with his demands. He then extorts money and favors...

name: Milt Nauman
description: Very little is known about Milt Nauman, other than that he has to "fix up"Johnny Silverhandfrom time to time, including giving him hisKiroshioptical implants and his trademark silver hand. On April 16th2013, Silverhand was brought to Nauman's clinic byLyle Thompson, after being ambushed bymercenarieshired byArasakawho were out to kidnapAlt Cunningham. Milt had a son who served in the same company as Silverhand, but was killed during theSecond Central American Warin2005. He therefore considers him as a second son.

name: Mitch Anderson
description: Mitch Andersonis a member of theAldecaldosnomadnation, and a veteran of theUnification War. He's good friends withScorpionandPanam. Mitch and his friendScorpionserved with otherAldecaldosaspanzerboysfor theFree Statesduring theUnification War. He and Scorpion faced many hardships during the war, including straining combat and were forcibly given drug cocktails that could causecyberpsychosisin order to keep their synapses strong to control their tanks. They both developed severe PTSD as a result. Mitch and Scorpion eventually recovered and returned with the Aldecaldos, helping them with their...

name: Morgan Blackhand
description: Morgan Blackhandis asolowith an anodized black-chromecyberarm, defined by the fact that he is a pragmatist. A veteran of theSecond Central American War, Morgan became amercenaryoften employed by theMilitechcorporation. By2020, Blackhand was known as a street-smart guy who was constantly looking out for his own best interest. He usually went for the highest bidder and accomplished their gigs however he saw fit for his own benefit. Blackhand's reputation as a top solo was partly due to the fact that he was able to capture targets alive, rather than simply killing them. He was considered to be a...

name: Mr. Blue Eyes
description: Mr. Blue Eyesis a mysterious figure involved in the politics and life ofNight City. Through the tasks given toVbyElizabethandJefferson Peralez, it is possible to find that a certain "shady" organization has inserted itself into the life of the up and coming mayoral candidate. By the time some layers are peeled off, V will receive a direct holo warning from an unknown caller, stating that no matter what V tells to Jefferson nothing will change, and also warning them not to keep meddling in their affairs. The unknown caller will make it clear that they know about V's true nature and goals,...

name: Mr. Brightman
description: Mr. Brightmanis a straycatwho can be seen at various times outsideViktor's ClinicinCyberpunk 2077. Mr. Brightman is first encountered atop the stairway leading down to Viktor's Clinic, duringV's first visit. The cat can be seen outside Viktor's clinic a second time after V leavesMisty's rooftop, before embarking on their final mission. If V pets the cat, Misty will mention that its name is Mr. Brightman, and will say "We found the poor guy in the trash behind the clinic. I think he missesJackie".

name: Mr. Kipper
description: Ahighriderresident of theCrystal Palace, Mr. Kipper is a self-taught musician. Over the course of his career he worked as a DJ, composer, producer, performer and radio host.His music can be often heard on107.5 Dark Star, an interplanetary radio station. In2077, Mr. Kipper, in collaboration with a DJ duoPrivate Press, established a terrestrial radio station,99.9 Impulse. To promote it, he and Private Press went on anEarthtour.In June they hosted an event atRiot, a nightclub inWatson,Night City.

name: Muamar Reyes
description: Muamar Reyes, commonly more known by his nicknameEl Capitán, is a prominentfixerin theSanto Domingodistrict ofNight City. El Capitán used to be acorpobut went out on his own as afixeronce he realised he'd rather be the one setting the rules of the game. He claims to have earned the nickname by helping people enough to achieve a commanding title worth of admiration, although his street reputation indicates it might actually be a reference to the difficulty of his character. He admires Santo Domingo due to the persistence of the people living in it. No matter who attempted to take over the...

name: Nash
description: Nash was a member of theWraiths, a group ofRaffen Shivwho operated out of theBadlandsand were mainly doing business in the fields of theft, murder, andchromesmuggling. He had a hideout in theRocky Ridge Mine Tunnelas well as a secret office room in the ghost town ofRocky Ridge. At some point, Nash and his crew got indebted to "aHungarian" and he devised a plan to make easyeddiesby stealing aThorton Mackinaw "Warhorse"fromPanam Palmer, a nomadsolooriginally from theAldecaldos.In order to get an opportunity to steal the car, Nash became a merc working forfixerRogue Amendiares, who paired him up...

name: Neil White
description: White is the owner of theMax-imum Pleasuresex shop on Republic Way inVista del Rey,Heywood.

name: Nix
description: Nixis a formercorpo, and anetrunnerin service toRogue, operating from theAfterlife. Nix is a well-known underground netrunner, spreading his reach through the fixer Rogue, consequentially exchanging services for influence. He will express particular interest inOld Netnetrunning tech, particularly those used byRache Bartmoss. Depending on the life path chosen, it is possible to pry out a bit of personal information from him, such as his involvement in the corporate world, which led, possibly inadvertedly, to abandoning his old life. In as few words as possible, he admits to being part of the...

name: Noah
description: Noah is the bartender of theSunset MotelinRed Peaks,Badlands. He is an acquaintance ofPanam Palmer.

name: Nolan Frakes
description: At some point in2077, Nolan ordered the execution ofGustavo Orta, theValentinos' interim leader. However, unbeknownst to Nolan, Martha was secretly dating Gustavo and would be present during the attack, causing her to get shot in the head and slip into a coma. Gustavo would survive the attack unscathed. After the incident, Nolan believed Gustavo to be entirely responsible for his daughter's critical condition, and contactedPadreto open up a contract on Gustavo's life.

name: Nomad Santiago
description: Santiago, commonly known asNomad SantiagoorSantiago Aldecaldo, was the leader of theAldecaldosnomadclan. He was a mostly reserved and quiet man who also often came across as a slightly crude nomad stereotype. To some degree, Santiago cultivated this image, in part to fool the statics and in part because it gave him an excuse to pursue fast women (and even faster bikes), but he was nevertheless a hard worker and a skilled negotiator. Santiago was born in an army hospital nearBerlin,Germany. His family traveled often during his life, and the young kid was always on the move. Culturally,...

name: Norio Akuhara
description: Norio, also nicknamed Akki, for single-handedly disposing of a large number ofTyger Claws, started out as an experienced fighter following the ideology of Sota. His meditative approach to fighting had made him a formidable, unpredictable opponent, so it was not difficult for him to join a gang once he wished to do so. He examined and evaluated his bosses in fights, letting them deal with enemies alone to prove themselves and validate his decision to work for them. Never feeling kinship with the gang, he solely used them as a manner of boosting his finances to achieve a single goal, although,...

name: Nuka Ohlone
description: Nuka Ohlone, also know by his nicknameShank, is aTechieinCyberpunk 2077:Phantom Liberty.

name: Odell Blanco
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Oleg Darkevich
description: Oleg isDexter DeShawn's bodyguard and chauffeur. He does not appear to talk much but is very loyal to his employer. Oleg hascyberneticimplants on his hands as well as his neck in order to support it and help him take punches.

name: Oswald Forrest
description: Oswald Forrest, also known asWoodman, is the caretaker of the dolls who work atCloudsinCyberpunk 2077. Woodman is considered the talent manager of Clouds, and takes care of problems such as "problematic" dolls. He is very comfortable with his ties to theTyger Clawswhich has made him incredibly rude and arrogant. Many say Woodman has no empathy but he did once, and quickly discarded it after finding it useless. Vencounters him while infiltrating Clouds to find out the location ofEvelyn Parker. V has many ways of collecting the information from him, from bribing to threatening. Woodman reveals...

name: Ozob Bozo
description: Ozob was born inBrazil. At some point, Ozob's brother ripped off his nose during a fight using a pair of pliers. Instead of chroming a new nose, he decided that a grenade matched his style better. Later in his life he would become amercenary. In2045, while Ozob was wandering aroundNight City, he happened to walk into the infamousBozos' Hilaria event. After deciding to briefly join and blow something up, he disappeared amidst the crowd to the astonishment of the guests and prankster clowns present there. In2077, Ozob travelled to Night City, being surprised with how much the metropolis had...

name: Pablo Silva
description: Pablo was a loyal member of the6th StreetleaderRick Morton. AfterWill Gunnerand his people organised a coup and killed Morton, Pablo was made a scapegoat, with Gunner's people proclaiming that he conspired with the corpos and killed Morton on their orders. After assuming his position as the new leader of the gang, Gunner sent his people to hunt the ones remaining loyal to Morton, including Pablo. Not long after Morton's death, Pablo contacted with anNCPDofficer to give him some important documents. While on his way to the meeting with the officer, Pablo contacted his wife Salma and asked her...

name: Paco Torres
description: Paco Torres is a newly recruited member ofDogtown'sBARGHEST. He is friends withBarbara Okoye. After his first mission, he stole fromKurt Hansen, and feared to be eventually caught. He askedVfor help on how to deal with the situation.

name: Pedro Aimar
description: Pedro Aimar is a former algorithm coder forZetatech. He was fired by his employer after developing health issues due to hisALS, and them not wanting to cover for hisfull body conversion. Having found aRussiandoctor by the name of Stanislav Federov, who was willing to perform the procedure in Russia, Aimar was desperate for money.Wanting to take revenge on Zetatech while also making enougheddiesfor the procedure, Aimar put out a contract for anymercswanting to help him steal a truck full of Zetatech AV thrusters. El Capitánreached out toVin order to help Pedro out. Using aChineseICE-breaker, V...

name: Pepe Najarro
description: Pepe can be found working behind the bar, often double shifts without break at the most prominent local club, and he is fast to admit that he does it for his family. Despite putting all the extra hours in, he still has trouble paying offKirk, a loan shark and aspiring fixer of the Heywood district. Further down the road,Vmay revisit Pepe and provide their services for a taste of classical detective work regarding the private life of his wife,Cynthia. Due to her behaviour, lying about her whereabouts, followed by their child looking nothing like either of them, Pepe suspects a story as old as...

name: Peter Feldheimer
description: Peter Feldheimer was a covert agent uncovering a link betweenArasakaandNight Citymayoral candidateWeldon Holt. After contacting Moon Base he has been vaporized by unspecified weapon leaving only his shoes anda shardrecording his last conversation.

name: Peter Sampson
description: Sampson is aMilitechemployee and an avid street racer. In2076, during a race, he would be involved in a crash which took the life ofDean Russell,Claire Russell's husband. However, since the street races were not only illegal, but known to be violent with fatalities common to the sport, he suffered no legal consequences for the incident. Ever since, Claire has blamed Sampson for Dean's death, and wants revenge. At the start of thefinal race, Claire can be seen talking with Sampson, and V can talk, though it does not affect the outcome. After the race has started, during some point Sampson's...

name: Philippe Oreste
description: In2062, a large tropical storm devastated what remained ofHaiti, forcing its last residents to abandon the country in order to survive. Philippe Oreste, a captain of a ship, sailed through the waves, winds, and torrential rains of the storm to save 150 lives and guide them to safety atop pneumatic rafts. Over the following months, with their home lost, Philippe led the refugees in search of shelter and a new life, wandering around North America and eventually reachingNight City, where they were employed in the construction of a resort city in thePacificadistrict. Among the refugees was a gang...

name: Placide
description: AfterHaitiwas decimated by natural disasters, Placide, along with many other Haitians, moved intoPacifica, a run-down district ofNight City. Placide became the second-in-command of theVoodoo BoysunderMaman Brigitte. He radiated the aura of danger and threat – inspiring fear and respect in those around him. Placide cared little for the outsiders who came into Pacifica and would only help those in the Haitian community. Like most of the Voodoo Boys, he was a dedicated netrunner who was determined to uncover the secrets of theOld Net. In 2077,NetWatchhad taskedan agentto map out the Voodoo Boys...

name: Péter Horváth
description: At some point in his life Horváth spent time in jail, which caused such drastic change in his behaviour that people who knew him no longer recognized the man. Horváth is a former vendor who worked forChristine Markovat one of the stalls in theCherry Blossom Market. He eventually left his work at the stall to make speeches about former mayorLucius Rhyneand howcorporationshad controlled him. After a while, he showed back up at the stall with high-qualitycyberwareinstalled to the point where he was hardly recognizable. The cyberware was an anonymous gift from an unknown source that according to...

name: Rache Bartmoss
description: Rache Bartmossis a legendarynetrunnerin theCyberpunk-series who in the early21st centurybecame notorious as the man who caused theDataKrashand killed the oldNet. He invented theDemonandBloodhoundseries of programs. He also co-authored theRache Bartmoss' Guide to the NetandBrainware Blowoutbooks alongsideSpider Murphy. At just four years old, Rache Bartmoss started netrunning for the first time. Because of his inexperience with the Net, he used his real identity, oblivious to the potential risks. By the time he had realized his mistake, he was good enough that it no longer mattered. Throughout...

name: Randy Kutcher
description: Randy Kutcher is the oldest son ofJoss Kutcherand an unnamed father who was anAldecaldoNomad. He has two younger siblings, Monique and Dorian. When Randy was young he was close to his uncle,NCPDdetectiveRiver Ward, who used to send him a record of his favorite bandTainted Overlordevery year for his birthday. Randy's mental health and family life deteriorated severely following the death of his father. He began using drugs and developed a deep depression, and no longer saw his uncle. At some point in2077Randy chanced upon aNetsite ran byAnthony Harris. Harris, a serial killer known as Peter...

name: Raul Franco
description: Raul Franco ratted outValentinosbossGustavo Ortato6th Street. The Valentinos found out about it, and came after him. They would quickly find him in an alley on College Street inVista del Rey,Heywood.

name: Razor Hugh
description: Razor Hugh used to be a poor street kid like most Night Citizens who eventually joined theAnimalsand became a star athlete and professional boxer. Razor has elitecorposponsors and prototypeimplantssuch as carbon fibers,Titanium Bones, nanofiber RealSkinn, shock absorbers and hydraulic joints, all optimized by Night City's best bioengineers. He isNight City's three-time heavyweight champion and holds a record of forty-seven consecutive victories with twenty knockouts. Razor is told by his manager he must go to Night City to fight in the bush leagues in order to promote himself. Razor claims it...

name: Raúl Welles
description: Raúl Wellesis the father ofJackie Wellesand his brothers, and the ex-husband ofGuadalupe Welles. Raúl was an old schoolValentinoganger who frequently beat his children. One day Jackie had enough and grabbed his father's belt and beat him so badly that he was hospitalized. Jackie threatened that if he ever returned he would use it again. Jackie has not seen him ever since that day, and he kept the belt just in case he ever came back.

name: Richard Night
description: Richard Night was born in Pasadena, California, and was the second of five children. His parents were both researchers atCaltech— specializing in materials science. Night showed an aptitude for engineering at a relatively young age, but when a joint venture with his college roommate —Romney Zukarian— turned sour, an angry Night shifted his major from engineering to business financial investment. Armed with his new knowledge of the ins and outs of business, Night soon regained his company from his old rival. Applying his backgrounds in engineering and investment, Richard soon founded — along...
occupation: Partner of HFN (fmr.)CEO of Night Int.Founder ofNight City

name: Rick Morton
description: Morton was killed in a coup organized byWill Gunner. After assuming the leader position, Gunner's men hunted all of Morton's loyal people. To legitimize his new position, Gunner falsely stated that Morton had been killed byPablo Silvaand the traitors who sided with thecorporations.

name: River Ward
description: River Wardis a formerNCPDdetective inNight City. He is also a possibleromanceoption forVinCyberpunk 2077. Growing up, River and his sisterJoss' parents ran a small farm. Eventually it went out of business as larger corporations took over the agriculture industry. His parents took to running a grocery store and the family of four lived in the apartment area above it. One day, some drugged up thugs broke in looking for cash and, when they didn't find any in the store, went into the living quarters and demanded money from the father, who swore they had nothing else. Not satisfied with that...

name: Robert Wilson
description: Robert Wilson, usually just referred to asWilson, is a weapons vendor inCyberpunk 2077. He's a2nd Amendmentfranchise holder, and his shop is located inMegabuilding H10,Watson. Wilson seems to be the tinkering kind, paying more mind to the quality of his merchandise than the efficiency of sales. This is why he will not sell a weapon which hasn't first passed through his skilled hands, although just as well the reason of his continuous complaints regarding the waning business. His attempts at advertisement also fall short, as the activities he organizes appear to be more shooting classes with a...

name: Roger Wang
description: During his lifetime, Wang managed to set up his own supply network for chemicals. Wang'sfriendsuggested he should go into business with theAnimalsmemberBlake Croyle. After meeting with Croyle and simply by listening to some of the advice he was given by him, he got indebted. Roger tried to pay the debt in full, but was unable to do so after the accumulated "interest".In turn, after Blake made threats to his family, he granted Croyle access to his clinic in Kabuki. Instead of trying to pay off his debt, he first turned towards theNCPD, who basically told him to do it himself, and so he...

name: Roh Chi-Won
description: Roh Chi-Won (노지원), sometimes stylized asRoh Chi Wonis a former boxer, and boxing coach appearing inCyberpunk 2077. When he was younger, Roh used to be a very successful boxer, having won several dozens matches. Later in his life, he became the personal boxing coach forMacidew Coolidge, a former sports commentator forN54 News. Because of Coolidge getting himself into trouble by leavingNight City, after getting in debt with theTyger Clawsfor not living up to their matchfixing deal, they abducted Roh Chi-Won and stashed him inside theDeravaja Dojoon Brookland street inLittle China. Coolidge has...

name: Roman
description: Roman is the leader of a group ofScavengers. He recognizesVas the one who rescuedSandra Dorsett.

name: Ronald Malone
description: Ronald Malone, also known as theThe Dogtown Prodigy,Pacifica Typhoon, or justTyphoon, is aJunk VendorinCyberpunk 2077:Phantom Liberty. Malone is an African-American man of average age. He has brown eyes and black hair styled in a sculpted afro. Around his forehead a black and yellow bandana is tied to keep his hair in place. He wears a blue jacket with an orange text that says "NoControl" on each sleeve on top of a white and gold trimmed ballistic vest. His outfit is completed with a pair of green slacks and grayish-green dress shoes. On his right index finger he wears anNCU Signet Ring. When...

name: Russel Greene
description: Greene was paranoid about security, installing turrets around the house and planting mines near the game. He then invested in a faultynetrunnerchair and wanted to create his ownICE. A power failure caused the systems to malfunction, which in turn got his wife and son killed.

name: Saburo Arasaka
description: Saburo Arasaka(荒坂 三郎), also known asthe Emperor, went from being an Imperial Japanese Navy Air Service Pilot to the corporate God of the 21st century. Born inTokyo,Japanhe made theArasaka Corporationinto one of the largestcorporationsof the world. Saburo is proud, honorable and, like the true Samurai Shogun he claims to be, he's power hungry. Although he is ancient and physically decrepit, Saburo Arasaka remains the genius he always was in his younger years. Despite his age, Saburo never gave up his control over Arasaka. When his eldest son,Kei, became the Chief Executive Officer of the...

name: Sam Carter
description: Sam Carteris a6th Streetganger inCyberpunk 2077. His appearance is exclusive to theStreetkidLifepath. WhilePadreis givingVa ride, Sam Carter, accompanied by other6th Streetgangers, appears and threatens the fixer at gunpoint to tell theValentinosto abandonVista del Rey. Padre or V warn him to leave. While the 6th Streeter complies, he threatens Padre again, stating their business isn't done.Sam was eventually captured by the Valentinos and executed by Padre himself.

name: Sandayu Oda
description: Sandayu Oda(Japanese: 小田 三太夫,Hepburn:Oda Sandayu) is asoloand cyberninja employed by theArasaka Corporation, assigned as the personal bodyguard ofHanako Arasaka. He specializes in martial arts and utilizesArasaka Mantis Bladesin combat. Upon being admitted to the Arasaka ranks, Oda had been trained byGoro Takemuraas a highly skilled fighter. Through shared battle experience, the two have managed to achieve a sense of camaraderie and mutual respect, acknowledging an honourable debt to be called upon once the need arose. Oda's skills were recognized by Arasaka and, as such, he was appointed...

name: Santiago Molina
description: Santiago Molina is the owner of a ripperdoc clinic inWellsprings,HeywoodinNight City. He has no implants himself, even though they would make his job more efficient and easier. Santiago feels that getting implants would be a waste, as he expects that at some point theplanetwill be hit by a massive solar flare, which would cause him to go blind if he hadKiroshiimplants. Despite his own scepticism, Santiago has a good reputation as a ripperdoc and likes his job.

name: Satoshi Ueno
description: Satoshi is aClothing Vendorat theLongshore StacksinDogtown. He claims to have designed clothes himself in the past.

name: Saul Bright
description: Saul Brightis the leader of theAldecaldosgroup that roams theBadlandsaroundNight City. Fellow AldecaldoPanam Palmeridolized Saul during his more adventurous days, fondly remembering stories about him moving civilians across the border during a bombardment or hijacking aPetrochemtanker, opening the valves, cranking a few eights to set the desert ablaze and give the kids a fun show. Saul assumed leadership of an Aldecaldos packwhen they were in a fragile state, so bad that one mistake could have caused them to lose everything. When one of the clan members,Driss "Scorpion" Meriana, returned from...

name: Seamus Sawicki
description: Seamus Sawicki is a member of theAnimalsand a bouncer at one of their clubs. One day someMilitechinterns hurt some joygirls at that club and Seamus was ordered by his boss to gather up some men and take these people out. V can choose to kill or incapacitate the group after encountering Seamus and his posse right after they killed the interns.

name: Sebastian Ibarra
description: In his younger days, Sebastian was a member and priest of theValentinos, with close ties to the Juarez cartel. He had his whole body covered in tattoos, and spent several years in prison. At some point later in his life, Sebastian was caught in a bloodbath atMoto Cielo. After managing to survive the event, he converted to what he considered a more noble calling, becoming afixer. By2070, Padre was a highly respected and dangerous man that operated out ofthe GleninHeywood.

name: Sergei Karasinsky
description: Karasinsky is a Russian man who has run afoul of theTyger Claws. He has been working his way back into their good graces, and his final "peace offering" to the gang is inside the trunk of aVillefort Alvarado V4F 570 Delegatefound in a garage rented by him from a Bri Colvin.In theGig: Olive Branch,Wakako OkadatasksVwith driving the car to the Tyger Claws. If V decides to open the trunk of the car, they will discover that the peace offering is actuallyBiotechnicaSenior Quality Assurance AssistantAlex Pushkin.

name: Shaitan
description: During the mid-2010s, Shaitan was known as a fullborgblack-ops specialist and anti-corporate type with a special hatred forArasaka. His obsession knew no bounds, as he had decided the corporation's destruction was a paramount objective of his. When working as amercenary, even though Shaitan was willing to accept any job that he could get away with, it always had to be against Arasaka in some way on form, and it had to have serious collateral damage possibilities too. He was also known for occasionally creating or modifying gigs just so he could destroy the corporation's property. Shaitan...

name: Shiming Xu
description: In the 2040s, Colonel Shiming Xu was appointed by the government ofChinato manage an obsolete and collapsing defense economy that was only being kept alive due to government subsidies. After four years of leadership, Colonel Xu renamed the companyKang Tao. The newcorpcreated theA-22B Chao "smart" pistolthat hit the market in 2050. By 2077, they are leading the smart weapon market.

name: Simon Randall
description: Simon Randall,better known asRoyce, is the leader of theMaelstromgang inCyberpunk 2077. Royce is a psychopath. He violently took over one of the keyMaelstromcrews in the city from the last boss,Brick.He is impossible to control, impossible to predict – you can never be sure Royce won't just pull out his gun and shoot you in the head, just for the hell of it. DuringThe Ride,Dexter DeShawntasksVandJackie Welleswith purchasing a stolenMilitechbot from Royce's gang. The Pickupmission can be completed in a variety of ways. If done a peaceful deal with them, Royce will keep on leading the gang and...

name: Slavoj McAllister
description: Slavoj McAllister is the frontman of theCartesian Duelists, an industrial rock band. On June 10th,2077,Slavoj McAllister caused a violent outbreak at theMaelstromcontrolledTotentanznightclub inNorthside,Watson, throwing a tear gas canister at the paparazzi in the crowd. Before this ensued, he and his band premiered their new songs titled "Cybernetic Soul", "Mind Is Freedom", and "Corgito Ergo Sum", which were met with mixed response. A new album from the Cartesian Duelists for a release soon, and according to rumors on theNetit will be titled "War of Truths".

name: Solomon Reed
description: Solomon Reedis aSolo/Lawmanand a major character inCyberpunk 2077:Phantom Liberty. Reed is a tall, dark and masculine individual of African descent with short hair, goatee with a connected mustache (a circle beard), and visible cyberware in his temples and neck. He tends to wear a long, dark leather jacket with a red lining inside and a shirt underneath. He wears a long necklace with a circular pendant. In 2079, Reed seemingly has more cyberware in his hands and arms; with his fingers completely replaced by chrome. Solomon Reed was a member of theNUSA SpecOps. His unit, includingMaine, was...

name: Spector Cheng
description: Prior to becoming a weapons vendor inNight City, Cheng worked as a head of club security inMemphis. Somewhere between 2043 and 2044, Kerry Eurodyne had a gig scheduled in his club. He managed to miss a man with ill intentions heading backstage. By the time Cheng arrived to the scene, the assailant had been out cold. As he tells it, the man went in, put a knife to Kerry's throat but, after talking to the rock star, he instead opted for sharing a tequila with him. Cheng is also quick to admit that, should Kerry actually have told the club boss about the security breach he had suffered, the head...

name: Stanley Media
description: Stanley is the radio host ofNight City's early morningnewsflash. He has a daughter. At some point, he took his daughter to abodysculptingclinic and requested them to perform whatever operations she wanted to undergo, even if it was aExoticfull body conversion. The clinic staff had initially refused this request, as exotics had fallen out of fashion three decades ago, but relented in the end and provided a discount on the operations. Shortly afterwards, Stanley disowned his daughter as he wished for her to "look like human royalty" if she was to receive his inheritance.

name: Starkey
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Stefan
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Steve Kowalski
description: Steve Kowalskiis a character inCyberpunk 2077. He is found dead during one of theAssault in ProgressinRocky Ridge,Badlands.Tyger Clawsmembers killed him to frame6th Streetfor that.

name: Steve Sanchez
description: Steve Sanchez is a teenager living in theWest Wind ApartmentsofPacificainNight City, living with his father, Henry and his mother, Jill. He has a difficult family life, being the victim of beatings from his father and a mother who is frequently preoccupied withBDs. Steve is a big music fan and aspires to be a guitarist and songwriter, but lacks the confidence. In2077, theengramofJohnny Silverhandinhabiting the body ofVmoved into neighboring apartment to Steve. During this time, the two became well acquainted, with Johnny teaching Steve how to play the guitar and imparting advice on writing...

name: Steven Santos
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Taco (Aldecaldos)
description: Taco is a member ofAldecaldos, first met as a guard inGun Music. If Aldecaldos are helped during that quest, he can be talked to in theAldecaldo Campafterwards. He has a twin brotherJeff.

name: Taki Kazo
description: Taki Kazo was a boss of theTyger Claws. He believed he could ruleJapantownwithout the influence of the primaryWestbrook (2077)fixer,Wakako Okada. Kazo had been making deals at theShinto Shrinewhich Wakako had been aware of. She hiredVto bug the Shrine's computer so she would know his plans.

name: Tatsuya Takei
description: He isn't the smartest when it comes down to technology, and is berated for it by his fellow Tyger Claws.

name: Taylor Gibbs
description: Originally part of a nomad family, he betrayed his clan to theRaffen ShivatTipton Peakresulting in the former's slaughter, By2077. he is a resident ofDogtownwho joined Jacob Long in trying to steal anairdropfromBARGHEST, despite having a bad feeling about it.While going up the abandoned hotel with Long onElizabeth Kressstreet to get a good vantage point, Long and Gibbs unknowingly stumble uponVand PresidentRosalind Myershiding out in theKress Street Hideout.

name: Ted Fox
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Theodore Collins
description: In2077Mike was supposed to lay low after a gig he did for Collins. Ted soon realized that Mike was gone and started being worried for the netrunner's safety. Mike eventually picked up his call and the two had an argument, but their call got cut short when somebody arrived atMike's hideout.That day he disappeared without a trace and his fate remains unknown. Ted was soon forced to leave Night City because of unclear reasons and was unable to search for Mike.Some time later Mike's unit was available for rent again.

name: Theodore Simos
description: Theodore Simos, also known asTeddy, is aNomadand member of theAldecaldosinCyberpunk 2077. Teddy has an outgoing personality thriving on humor and the loyalty to his fellow Aldecaldos. Like several of his fellow clan members, Teddy is a veteran of theUnification Warof2069and2070.

name: Thomas Hays
description: Hays worked withfixerKirk Sawyer, but suspected that the fixer was double crossing him. To confirm his suspicions, Hays sets up a trap, feeding Sawyer with false information aboutMilitechcyberwarebeing transported in a van parked at theTirempire Auto Shoplocated inArroyo,Santo Domingo. After Sawyer sendsVto retrieve the "cyberware", Hays and two otherValentinosambushed Sawyer and his bodyguardBig Joewhile they waited outside Tire Empire, killing them both. AfterVreturns, Hays will taunt the mercenary, claiming anyone who works with Sawyer is a "gonk little bitch", and demand that V say it.

name: Ti Neptune
description: Ti was anetrunnerwho along alongsideBrigittewas attempting to contactAlt Cunninghamfrom beyond theBlackwall. The Voodoo Boys made a deal withEvelyn Parkerto steal theRelicbiochip fromYorinobu Arasaka, which contained the digitized personality construct, also known asengram, ofJohnny Silverhand. They believed the only way Cunningham would come to them was if they used Johnny's engram as bait. Upon discovering thatNetWatchwas attempting to penetrate their independent data fort,Rezo Agwe, Neptune investigated, but was quickly stopped by theBlack ICEdeployed by theNetWatch agentand was placed in...

name: Timmy G
description: Timmy G was anetrunnerfor most of his life.He started working as afixerinNight Citysometime in the2060s. At one point he got pulled over byNCPDofficerFrank, who discovered that Timmy was transporting neuroreactors stolen from aPetrochemlab. Frank let him walk for 20% of the profit from the cargo and the two became friends. In the2070s, Timmy G had ahideoutin a postindustrial area ofWatson. He was considered quite paranoid, as he installed cameras on the stairs to his floor, which he reserved all for himself. In2071, he was contacted by Frank and asked to look for any information about the...

name: Timothee LeBeau
description: Lebeau is a member of theTyger Clawsand the instructor at one of their bases,Deravaja Dojo. LeBeau is in the dojo's training area insulting his trainees.Vcan choose to kill him and his trainees but they can be easily snuck past.

name: Tom
description: Tom is the owner of arestaurant chaininNight City, and can usually be found as a chef in hisoriginal dinerinLittle China. Rumor has it that in order to rest from time to time, he has a few staff members biosculpted to look like him.

name: Tom Ayer
description: Ayer is a serial killer and the leader of a small group ofMaelstromgang members operating from a industrial yard on Richmond Street and Kennedy Ave, nearbyMegabuilding H12, where he oversees the production and dealings of illegal stimulants in the area. He is wanted byNight Cityauthorities, which have issued a reward for his neutralization.

name: Tom Caldera
description: Tom Calderaisdollwho works in the VIP area of the dollhouseClouds. If V assists the dolls in ousting theTyger Clawsfrom Clouds, they will kill Tom in retaliation.

name: Tommie Walker
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Toshiro Harada
description: Toshiro Harada(Japanese: 原田敏郎) is anArasakaexecutive who appears in theCyberpunkuniverse. Toshiro was in charge of theArasakaregional office of Night City during its construction.During this time he found out about a brilliantnetrunnernamedAlt Cunninghamworking forITSwho created a program known asSoulkiller.He organized a booster gang to kidnap Alt and bring her to the tower unharmed. Once Alt awoke in his office he greeted her with a drink and asked her about the program she developed. He considered her a valuable asset to helping him recreate her work in the Arasaka office mainframe. During...

name: Trevor Brass
description: Trevor was a youngAldecaldosmember, that wanted to get some extra money by dealing withWraiths. In the end, that's what got him killed.

name: Valdemar
description: Valdemar the Bully is a member of theAnimals, a gang that devotes themselves to reach beyond peak human physical condition to establish themselves as the new dominant human subspecies.

name: Vance Noren
description: Vance Norenis a character inCyberpunk 2077, together withBrad Stacythey annoyDarrell ZhouduringA Day In The Lifewhen they can be dealt with.

name: Vasquez
description: In2077he was assigned to safely transport the convicted murderedJoshua StephensontoFourth Wall Studios.

name: Vic Vega
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Viktor Vektor
description: Viktor Vektor, orVikfor short, is aripperdocinCyberpunk 2077. Hisclinicis located behindMisty's EsotericainLittle China,Watson. Talented, patient, and professional, Viktor has extendedV's credit on a number of occasions, but never complains. Viktor was once a heavyweight boxer in Watson and a member ofNight City Devils, competing in the Watson Boxing Grand Prix. He eventually came in second place in the finals.He left that life behind, and has come to prefer the relatively straightforward life of a back-alley ripperdoc. He continued to watch boxing matches avidly. His shop saw a steady amount...

name: Wade Bleecker
description: Wade Bleecker, better known asMr. Hands, is afixercovering business in the areas ofPacificainNight City. Wade Bleecker worked as a well-known high rankingcorporateatPetrochem. He was very successful in his career until a sudden shake-up in upper management, in which Bleecker was chosen to be sacrificed for the corporation. He managed to survive the assassination attempt, but after a bounty was put on his head, Wade was forced to disappear. Wade eventually changed his face and name as he became to be known as Mr. Hands, the only prominentfixerinPacifica.His reputation grew asNight City's most...

name: Weldon Holt
description: Weldon Holt, nicknamed "Rhyne's Bulldog", is the acting mayor ofNight CityinCyberpunk 2077. Weldon Holt served as Deputy Mayor under MayorLucius Rhyne. In2077both him and the mayor met withArasakarepresentatives atKonpeki Plaza, in which they discussed the lockdown ofWatson. After Lucius Ryhne's death, Holt took on the role of acting mayor and announced that he would run for the mayor's office against CouncilmanJefferson Peralezin Rhyne's stead. Commentators and Holt himself observed that he shared many of Rhyne's corporation-friendly political stances and would be more or less a continuation...

name: Wesley Hunt
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Wilky LaGuerre
description: Wilky LaGuerre, better known by his pseudonymSlider, is aVoodoo BoysNetrunnerinCyberpunk 2077:Phantom Liberty. Wilky has white eyes due to his blindness.He sits in a chair attached to a machine, which he uses to continue his netrunner work. He has dark brown locks which fall to his chin. Several scars mark the cyberware on his face. He wears a sleeveless, striped blazer with a bright orange lapel and black fur tufts at the back, paired with matching slacks. On his feet, he wears sandals. He has noticeable long brown nails, which seem to be painted. A piece of dark metal cyberware is embedded...

name: Will Gunner
description: Will Gunneris the leader of the6th Street, acting as their General. Gunner's gang is on a quest to "bring justice" toNight City. Will Gunner only recently came into this position after he betrayed and killed the previous leader,Rick Morton, and his supporters. To legitimise his new position, Gunner falsely stated that Morton had been killed byPablo Silvaand the traitors who sided with thecorporations.After taking over, Gunner initiated a large-scale purge of the gang to rid himself of all supporters of the previous leadership. He ordered the deaths of 6th Street gang members who were...

name: William Hare
description: William Hareis a formerMilitechcorporal discharged for showing signs of an incomingcyberpsychosis. William Hare signed up to serve with Militech at 17 years old after seeing one of their posters. Witnessing their multi-millioneurodollarequipment and armored soldiers, filled him with a sense of adventure and power. He proudly notes being 3rd Light Division, 155th Infantry Regiment, getting everything he wanted with Militech. However, seven years inBrazilturned his dream job into a nightmare. Stuck in the jungle, fighting just to survive, killing and watching his comrades be killed around him...

name: Willie McCoy
description: McCoy is a fixer living somewhere in the northern reaches of South California. Being innomadterritory, McCoy gets most of his pay from the clients that hire nomads. At some point, Willie was contacted byJackie Welles, who needed a nomad to help him smuggle a crate across theBorder CrossingintoNight City. The fixer hiredVto do the job; both of whom already knew each other as they had worked together in the past. The problem was that V had left theBakkersprior to their conversation, but V persuaded him to help them one last time. Eventually, when V was reaching the meeting point, theircarbroke...

name: Wu Dong
description: Wu Dong(Chinese: 吴东,Wú Dōng/Japanese: ウー・ドン,Ū Don) is a character featured inCyberpunk 2077.

name: Wyatt Alken
description: Wyatt was a6th Streeterwho stole and sold cars. In 2077, in his parking lot inCharter Hill, he was tasked with guardingSamuraiparaphernalia that had been taken fromNancy Hartley's son,Dan. He also got into his possession Dan's car, aRayfield Caliburn. Vhas the option to kill, incapacitate, or just sneak past him. He is in the line of sight by most of the present 6th Streeters so encountering him will most likely result in a firefight.

name: Yorinobu Arasaka
description: The second son toSaburo Arasakaand first son toMichiko Arasaka, Yorinobu is the rebelliousbōsōzokuleader of theSteel Dragons. Although a sworn bōsōzoku leader rockerboy, he eventually became the heir to theArasakaempire after the death of his elder brotherKei. Yorinobu disagreed with everything his father set out to accomplished and abandoned everything because of it. He is passionate, caring, and determined more than anything else. Yorinobu is the charismatic counter toJohnny SilverhandinTokyo(though he does not play in a band). He was known to rally up the Japanese public to rebel against...

name: Yuri Bychkov
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Zane Jagger
description: Jagger is the manager of theJingujiclothing store inDowntown,City Center. He primarily sells expensive, high-end clothes. Despite wanting to keep his clientele private, he saysGillean Jordanis among them.

name: Zeke Daniels
description: Zeke is the guitarist in the band. A few years ago he and his band, Busted Flush, were up and coming street rockers with nation-wide prospects. UntilDMSput them out of business by putting two of the members six feet under and one more on permanent life-support. Since DMS seemed intent on finishing the job, ZZ blewNew York CityforNight City. He figures that if he's going to be safe anywhere, it's going to be as an employee of the toughest Solo bar around. When the band isn't playing, ZZ shares table waiting duties withBanger.

name: Zen Master
description: While atReconciliation Park, the Zen Master first spoke with a local merc namedV, discussing the ways of meditation. The Zen Master gave V abraindancemeditation experience concerning the Earth element. After encountering the Zen Master for the final time, he left behind analtarwhich V could display in theirapartment, hanging off the shelf above their bed.

name: Zhan Qiu
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Ziggy Q
description: Ziggy Q is the host ofNight After Night with Ziggy Q, a talk show and is a famous media personality.Ziggy interviews many guests from celebrities, musicians, religious figures, corporate execs, biologist,NCPDofficers, politicians, and other TV show hosts. Ziggy Q is often energetic and charismatic, using sharp movement to entertain the guests. Ziggy notably, does not care for logical personalities and more often injects his own agenda within his interviews showing a clear bias. Ziggy occasionally performs acts of philanthropy on his show. One such example is in 2077 when one of his guests,...

name: Zion Wylde
description: Zion Wylde was an agingUnification Warveteran who worked as asoloinNight City. In 2077, after being hired by theVoodoo Boysfor a simple recon gig, he had a religious experience in which he believed he witnessed the Loa, the gods of the Voodoo religion, and was convinced that he could gain entry into their sacred realm by providing sacrifices. It is implied that this experience was the result of the Voodoo Boys hacking him, and the job he was hired to do was only bait. Left with damaged implants, Wylde succumbed tocyberpsychosisand wandered theBadlandsto the east of Night City, where he...

name: Zor
description: Zor was convinced that his wife and son perished in2070when Katsuo ordered theArasakafleet to fire upon a northern district ofNight City. This resulted in a ceasefire between the corporation andNUSAforces, in which he served. Driven by his thirst for vengeance, he hijacked a militaryAVand launched six rockets at the nearest warship, effectively sinking it.The AV was shot down by the fleet's anti-aircraft defenses soon after, and Zor was recovered from the wreckage byMilitechsoldiers. Expecting to be tried for treason, he was instead taken to an undisclosed laboratory, where he had a ripperdoc...
occupation: Pest control employee (formerly)AV pilot (formerly)Soldier (formerly, fabricated memories)

name: Ainara Álvarez
description: Ainara Álvarezis a character inCyberpunk 2077. She isJudy Álvarez's grandmother, and can only be spoken to through phone messages. As Female V, about a day after second date inI Really Want to Stay at Your Houseplus a visit to collect Judy's gift in Judy's apartment, Judy would text to apologize for blabbing about her relationship and warned V about Ainara's interrogation skills. Described as "5'2" of pitbull", but is sweet after the initial interrogations. Her reservations revolve around V being a merc and her distrust of Corpo's with fake manners (sinceMaikafit the bill, but it's better if...

name: Alena Xenakis
description: Alena Xenakis,also known asAlex, is a character inCyberpunk 2077:Phantom Liberty. Alena grew up in the slums of theLos AngelesMetroplex, and following her dream, she became an aspiringbraindanceactress. Unknown to her, the braindance studio she joined was a front for theFederal Intelligence Agency. Her formidable acting skills impressed them enough that she was recruited bySolomon Reed. Ever since, she has worked with the FIA in many covert operations, becoming a talented shapeshifter. At some point after theUnification War, Alex was placed inDogtownas an undercover agent.

name: Altiera Cunningham
description: Altiera Cunningham,better known asAlt, was the bestnetrunnerinNight Cityduring the 2000s-2010s. She was described as a beautiful and talented woman; having worked for theITSCorporation, and being the developer of the infamousSoulkillerprogram. Cunningham was also the girlfriend of the famousrockerboyJohnny Silverhand. Her whole life changed however, when she was kidnapped by theArasakaCorporation, who used her to create a version of the program for them, and later made her the program's first victim. Now her consciousness exists only as a digital ghost inthe Net. Cunningham was one of those...

name: Ana Friedman
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Angelica Whelan
description: Angelica has pink hair with blue streaks. She wears aStr33t Dandy composite-coated capatop her head. Around her neck, she wears a black choker with purple rims. She also wears theBermuda Triangle protective-mesh muscle tank, layered under a gold bolero jacket. For pants, she wears tight leather slacks adorned with a goldSeigaihapattern. She wears gold bands on both forearms, which extend to her middle fingers in the form of a vertical line and rings. On the back of her left hand, she has a small tattoo.

name: Angie Mielech
description: Angie Mielech, also known asPakeha, is a character inCyberpunk 2077. She was added inPatch 1.5as part of a newMini World Story. Little is known about Angie, other than that she most likely lives somewhere inNight City, as she can be found at the Pier inWellsprings. At some point in2077, she lost herKeyin the bay of Wellsprings.Vcan retrieve and return the key to her.

name: Anna Hamill
description: Anna Hamill worked as a patrol officer inNight City. Amidst the rife corruption of theNCPD, Anna remained honest and was against any form of injustice. Her intentions were always pure, and she was one of the few good cops in town looking to make a difference. This, however, did not sit well with her less ethical colleagues. She would often become involved in matters the NCPD were already well aware of but simply turned a blind eye to. Despite the hostility from her colleagues, she persisted. While decent and honest, Anna is shown to be quick tempered and impulsive. In 2077, Anna began working...

name: Anna Nox
description: Anna Noxis aMoxleader and manager of a Mox warehouse on Longshore North, she sufferedcyberpsychosisupon experiencing abraindancefeaturing the suffering and death of a Mox protectee. Anna worked atLizzie's Barand managed a nearby Mox warehouse. Following the death of a fellow Mox, she commenced with her own private investigation into the crime that had taken place. Starting with anXBD, Anna's associateLil Bex, contracted the crack-BD-tunerHal Cantos. Hal was required to quickly isolate code from the XBD containing the death of a girl under the Moxes care, consequently allowing the...

name: Annie Capolino
description: Trigger is a young woman who helpsIcepickwith security at the bar. She's a Solo specializing in security penetration and stealth operations. She frequently takes leaves of absence from the bar to run Jobs for clients. Trigger is something of an expert on the local crime scene. I was told to ask her if I had any questions about local gangs or crime outfits. Trigger spends a lot of her time withDollar Bill, although no one seems clear on their relationship; neither would talk about it. Trigger, like her associate, is a permanent resident of the Hotel Sierra building. She lives in a third-floor...

name: Arabelle Luvasha
description: Arabelle Luvashais a character inCyberpunk 2077. She was added inPatch 1.5as part of a newMini World Story. Little is known about Arabelle, other than that she most likely lives somewhere inThe Glen,Heywood, as she can be found in theReconciliation Park.

name: Aurore Cassel
description: A French netrunner, Aurore Cassel and her twin brotherAymerichave worked for various high-profile clients inFranceand WesternEuropeunder their collective pseudonym "Skylight". At an indeterminate time they were hired byMilitechto reactivate the secretiveProject Cynosure, with the goal of capturing and harnessing powerfulAIsfrom beyond theBlackwall. They also did various jobs for the criminal underworld of France and Western Europe, although such work was not without consequences--Aurore ended up in a stint atParis's high-security La Santé Prison for five years, and ultimately had a bounty...

name: Ayo Zarin
description: Ayo is a heavily chromed individual, with several arm and leg modifications as well as a cybernetic jaw. She utilizes theAgaoutomahawk. She was running the local Voodoo Boys at the ruins ofLuxor High Wellness SpainDogtown.Dodgercontacted her to hire twelve Voodoo Boysnetrunnersto protectHansen's reception at theBlack SapphireV attended withReed.

name: Bara Nova
description: Bara Nova is aRussianDJ and music producer whose songs are featured inNight City's95.2 Samizdat Radio, and they are quite popular among NC night clubs such as theEmpathy.

name: Barbara Okoye
description: Barbara Okoye, better known by her nicknameBabs, is a member ofBARGHESTinCyberpunk 2077:Phantom Liberty.

name: Beatrice Ellen Trieste
description: Beatrice Ellen Trieste,better known by her handle8ug8ear, is a minor character inCyberpunk 2077. 8ug8ear was a skilledNetrunnerliving inJapantown,Westbrook,Night City. She is an associate ofWakako Okadaand theTyger Claws. At some point before 2077, she wrote and publishedan opinion piececritiquing the after-effects of theDataKrashbrought about byRache Bartmoss. In 2077, she was working together with Norimasa, a Tyger Claw member, to try and steal tech from aKiroshi Opticswarehouse job. The gig had her remotely hack the Kiroshi van and cut the alarms for the Tyger Claws to get access to the...

name: Bes Isis
description: Bes Isis, bornNancy Hartley, and known professionally asNancy Rocastle, is the ex-keyboardist for the bandSamurai. After the end of her musical career, she became an investigative journalist forNetwork News 54. Nancy Hartley was a kicker for a local Boostergang before joining the bandSamurai, for which she played the keyboard.She was a member of the band until 2008 when she spent seven months in jail for throwing her abusive husband out of their 83rd story apartment through the window. During her incarceration, the band was dissolved. At some point after her release, she took on the name Bes...

name: Blue Moon
description: Blue Moon(ブルームーン),orAoi Tsuki(青い月), is the pseudonym of one of the members of theJapanesegirl groupUs Cracks. AJapanesedescendent born in theNUSA, Blue Moon was among the three girls chosen to sign a deal withMSM MediaCorp, who at the time were looking for candidates with the perfect blend of charisma, talent and stage presence in order to complete against the more successfulAIsmaking music - the other two beingRed MenaceandPurple Force. NamedUs Cracks, the band swiftly became a world sensation. Being part of a globally-followed music sensation, Blue is not a stranger to psychofans. Once one...

name: Bree Whitney
description: In2077, Bree had to leaveNight Cityafter theNCPDissued an order for her capture. She managed to get access intoDogtownthrough thenorthern gate. At the end ofShot by Both Sides, Bree can survive the encounter or be killed byVorDante Caruso.

name: Briana Dolson
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Brigitte
description: Brigitte, more commonly known asMaman Brigitteor justMama, is aNetrunnerand the leader of theVoodoo Boysoperating inPacificainCyberpunk 2077. AfterHaitiwas decimated by natural disasters, Brigitte, along with many other Haitians, moved into Pacifica, a run-down district ofNight City. Like most of the Voodoo Boys, Brigitte is a dedicated Netrunner who was determined to uncover the secrets of theOld Net. She would often probe theBlackwallin the hopes of making contact with the rogue intelligences beyond the barrier, in order to find a safe way to gain passage through it. Believing that...

name: Brittany Hayes
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Camila Martinez
description: Camila Martinez is a member of theValentinos, a gang fixated on camaraderie and Chicano culture.

name: Carol Emeka
description: Like many members of the Aldecaldos, Carol is a veteran of theUnification War, from which she has unpleasant memories of being stuffed in panzers. In 2077, Carol's clan leaderSaul Brightwas kidnapped during a patrol by aRaffen Shivgang called theWraiths. A distressed Carol acted in his place while worrying about Saul's wellbeing, the clan's supplies being stuck outsideReno, and the prospect of the Wraiths returning due to the vulnerable state of the camp.Panam Palmer, a fellow Aldecaldo who had seperated from the clan earlier, would not stand with their inactivity and took it upon herself to...

name: Charlene Fox
description: She has a tattoo on her lower abdomen reading "судьба" (sud'ba), meaning "fate" or "destiny" in Russian.

name: Cheri Nowlin
description: Cheri is a receptionist atCloudsnightclub inMegabuilding H8inJapantown,Westbrook.

name: Christine Markov
description: In her younger years, Markov used to date amercwho helped her set up her stand in the market, before he disappeared without explanation. This lead Markov to believe he was probably dead. Christine has her own market stall at theCherry Blossom Market, where she sells and repairs tech. She has a former employee by the name ofPéter Horváth, who was being investigated byNCPDdetectiveRiver Wardand mercenaryV.

name: Claire Russell
description: Claire was a formerMilitechengineer before eventually quitting and opening her own autoshop inArroyo. Here she worked on various vehicles and eventually came up with her own called"Beast". At the same point, she took a night job as a bartender for the infamousAfterlifeclub. She was very friendly with both staff and customers, and even memorized their drinks. She was also responsible for naming many of the drinks on the menu after solo legends ofNight City. These drinks were usually the personal choices of the people who ordered them. At one point in her past, Claire was close friends with a...

name: Claudia Feldman
description: On October 172072, theNCPD PrecinctatCoastviewwas officially disbanded by Deputy Commissioner Claudia Feldman — with the full support ofMayorLucius Rhyne— after a series of violent protests aroundPacifica, resulting in the district being recognized as acombat zone.

name: Cynthia Najarro
description: Cynthia is the wife ofPepe Najarro, and works for a company on Skyline Street East. Together, they have a son, and have been married for 10 years.Vis tasked to follow her by Pepe after he suspects Cynthia has been cheating on him.

name: Dakota Smith
description: Dakota Smith, also known as the "Mad Coyote",is a member of theAldecaldosand one of the bestfixersfound in theBadlands, on the outskirts ofNight City. She can be found spending most of her time in her owngaragein theRocky Ridgeplains. When asked about the vast emptiness that are the Badlands, she is quick to oppose the thought, briefly elaborating how the various factions, thenomads,Raffen Shiv,corporations, and drifters in fact form a type of an ecosystem. The type that would not survive should one of them get removed. Despite being a nomad, she explains her staying put as being a static....

name: Dao Hyunh
description: Dao Hyunh is a met in theWellsprings,HeywoodduringCyberpsycho Sighting: Seaside Cafe. She succumbed tocyberpsychosisduring filming of a "Saigon Sisters" show.

name: Denny
description: Denny was the drummer for the band Samurai until their breakup, after which she joined the band Mastermind.Denny had a relationship withHenrysometime after the band broke up. Before 2077, Denny helped Henry get out of a tough situation where he was addicted to drugs. She managed to get him a good gig and a decent band to work with. Even after helping him, Henry kicked Denny out of his life after he didn't need her anymore. A month later after continued partying, Henry's band kicked him out after he started acting up again and he went back to Denny begging her for help on the street. She left...

name: Diana Cuno
description: Diana Cunowas a genetics engineer atBiotechnicainCyberpunk 2077. Together with Dr.Joanne Koch, she was involved inProject Nightingale, a ruthless medical experiment causing numerous casualties. After information on the project leaks to the public, Dr. Koch puts all blame on Diana. As she liquidated witnesses of secret research herself before, Diana knows she is on a hit list. She tries to escapeNight City, including a futile plea toWakako Okadato have her extracted, but is murdered byArasakagoons on behalf of Biotechnica as she attempted to leave the city.

name: Dietlinde
description: Little is known of this drink vendor aside of her not being keen on small talk. Whether it's a general rule or just a reaction to V not being part of her gang has not yet been discovered. She will remain a vendor in this location regardless of quests involving it.

name: Dollie Radcliff
description: Doll is a member of theMoxes, a gang of prostitutes devoted to "protecting working girls and boys."

name: Elizabeth Borden
description: Elizabeth Borden,also known asLizorLizzie, was a character in theCyberpunkuniverse. Liz Borden was the name given to a slightly psychotic joygirl working in theUptown Mallwith one of the smallergangsinNight City. In her her more lucid moments, Liz was a good source of information. In the2060s, Lizzie was the owner of astrip clubinKabuki. She was known for treating her workers fairly and defending them from violent clients. On May 132067,one of Lizzie's girls was brutally raped and murdered by members of theTyger Clawsgang. Lizzie avenged her by killing three of the assailants with an axe and...

name: Elizabeth Kress
description: Elizabeth Kressis a former president ofMilitech, and later the president ofNew United States of America. She was instrumental in keeping the NUSA together in the wake of theFourth Corporate Warand rebuilding the country. Elizabeth had her own interests, and turned the NUSA into a functional dictatorship for many years. Elizabeth was born in a smallUSAAir Force hospital onOkinawa,Japanin1978. Her father was a major in theUnited States Armed Forces, a distinguished officer with twenty years of experience. At the age of twenty-two, Elizabeth graduated from the Air Force Academy atColorado...

name: Elizabeth Peralez
description: Elizabeth Peralezis a prominentNight Citylawyer and political figure, devoting most of her time in 2077 to campaign organization for her husbandJefferson Peralez' mayoral candidacy. Elizabeth Peralez is first encountered through a brief and rather reserved holo call toV, offering a job upon meeting with her and her husband Jefferson. Namely, they wish for the death of former mayor ofNight City,Lucius Rhyneto be more thoroughly investigated, as they feel that his passing wasn't as clean and comfortable as the media portrayed it. Upon meeting the couple inHeywood District, V is given...

name: Emilia Morton
description: Emilia worked atBiotechnicabeforeJoanne Kochplanted forged papers on her. Emilia then threatened Joanne with exposure of the company's poisoning of a town and agreed to talk with the reporterManuel Mendoza. This caused Joanne to order her death, which was accomplished with hiredAnimalsmercenaries. The immediate aftermath of this attack can be encountered during anAssault in ProgressinCorpo Plaza.

name: Emilie Massenat
description: Emile is seen when she talks to Placide and mentions to him to not forget about something. Placide assures her he hasn't forgotten and continues his mission withV.

name: Ertha Ojasma
description: Ertha Djasma, commonly referred to asGrann Ertha, is a vendor who lives and works in thePacificadistrict. She is an affiliate of theVoodoo Boysand helps them when needed. She has a close relationship with the Voodoo Boys' lieutenant,Placide, and even refers to him as "[her] child". Placide's gift of a beheaded chicken may indicate that she is an active voodoo practitioner, while the arrangement within the shop she works in shows she could be providing personal care aside of just items of healing properties.

name: Eva Cole
description: She is mostly known for her ability to take down corruption among greedycorporates. In2077, she was made aware of suspiciousNetactivity by security, involvingBartolomeo Mordellini. Mordellini, in the possession of illicit recordings of her activities aboard her yacht, was asked to erase them.

name: Evelyn Parker
description: Evelyn Parker's intelligence and ambition drives her to demand more from life. Her goal of becoming a professional actress, and her rational head for the biz, led her to a job at the doll houseClouds, but this stepping stone in her career quickly became something much more permanent.It was in her days at Clouds where she met and befriendedJudy Álvarez. In 2077, Evelyn was a consort and frequent guest ofYorinobu ArasakaatKonpeki Plaza. TheVoodoo Boyslearned of this and hired her to acquire abraindancerecording of Yorinobu's suite for a planned heist. Evelyn realized that the Voodoo Boys were...

name: Fae Nesheim
description: At some point in2077, Nesheim was tasked to findCory Waring, aNetrunner, after receiving intelligence from theVoodoo Boysthat the netrunner was trackingairdropsand was selling the coordinates. Nesheim and her squad were successful in capturing Cory Waring, and strung him up on a nearby antenna tower.

name: Farida Nazeri
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Faye Russo
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Fiona Vargas
description: Fiona Vargas was a well-respected doctor specialized in cybernetic implants for young future talents in sports. She operated in Dogtown to avoid taxes and regulations.

name: Food Vendor (Cherry Blossom Market)
description: Her restaurant (formerlyRainbow Cadenza), simply called "Ramen Joint", can be found at theCherry Blossom MarketinJapantown,Westbrook. She works withKunio Shiki. Dakota Smithhas been to this ramen joint and has described it as good, recommending it to other people.

name: Gale Gibbs
description: Gale Gibbs is an employee ofMilitech, anAmericanarms-manufacturingmegacorporation.

name: Georgina Zembinsky
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Gillean Jordan
description: In2077, she gives a live report of the assault that was made during theArasakadashi parade taking place inJapantown,Westbrook. She can also be seen withArif Iqbalin theBlack SapphireduringYou Know My Name. Afterwards, she can be found doing a news report just inside ofNight City International and TranslunarduringThe Killing Moon.

name: Griselda Martinez
description: Martinez is a fan ofUs Cracks. So much so, that she adopted the name "Green Cloud", and started stalking members of the group after their arrival inNight City. After sending death threats to Us Cracks memberBlue Moonunder her pseudonym, the Us Cracks contracted themercenaryVto help them identify the stalker and teach them a lesson.

name: Guadalupe Alejandra Welles
description: Guadalupe Alejandra Welles, commonly known asMamá Welles, is the owner ofEl Coyote Cojobar inHeywood, and the mother ofJackie Welles. Mamá Welles marriedRaúl Welles, a member of theValentinos. Living inNight City, they had a son,Jackie. However, Raúl was abusive and violent towards her and her son, until the boy grew up and stopped him physically. After beating Raúl almost to death, Jackie promised to finish what he started if Raúl ever returned. After Jackie andVhadtheirfirstjobtogether, she allowed them to move with her and Jackie in theirhouse, somewhere in Heywood. After six months, V...

name: Hallie Coggins
description: Hallie Cogginsis a musical artist inCyberpunk 2077.She is musically portrayed by real life musicianRosa Walton.

name: Hanako Arasaka
description: Hanako Arasaka(荒坂 華子) is the third child and only daughter toSaburo.Hanako is a skilled, self-taughtNetrunnerand the head of the Kiji (雉) Faction of theArasaka Corporation.She is loved by many people and often described as sweet and beautiful in the eyes of many Arasaka employees. Hanako is an intelligent woman who didn't agree with her father's ambitions and had her own agenda she planned to follow. Despite knowing what her father's wishes entailed with her, she still loved and didn't want to displease him. Her relationship with her brotherYorinobuis one of great importance to her. Through...

name: Hiyame Miyigawa
description: Hiyame Miyiagawa is a member of theTyger Claws, a violent gang based inJapantown.

name: Imogen
description: Imogen can be found next toHerold Lowe's stand at theEBM Petrochem StadiumofDogtown, advertising several items for sale.

name: Iris Tanner
description: Tanner is known for her uncooperative attitude towardsFixers, in particularDakota Smith, who regards her as one of the best Techies she has met in her decades of living outsideNight City. According to Smith, Tanner is not a great people reader, as she frequently does business with theWraiths. In2077, she was asked by to repair several vehicles at aWraiths Outpostby a Wraith named Kojo, after their own Techie had fallen. While negotiating a price for the repairs at the Outpost, they gave Tanner an ultimatum; Either stick around or be chopped into pieces. Though, while guarded, Tanner managed...

name: Jaida Archer
description: Jaida Archer's corpse can be found inside one of the rooftop shanties inKabuki,Watson, lying on the floor in front of an array of computer equipment. Shortly before her death, she had a conversation with Tom Christopher regarding kidnapping a well-connected male victim for aBDrecording.

name: Jasmine Dixon
description: An cop whose integrity was her undoing, Jasmine Dixon started patrolling the streets ofNight Cityin2061and worked her way up to the ranks to sergeant. One day at the precinct, she overhead something she shouldn't have. Instead of ignoring it, she reported it to her supervisor who had her involuntarily committed to aNight City Center for Psychiatric Healthfacility inRancho Coronadofor her troubles. Vis later hired byMuamar Reyesto break her out of the facility and even though Jasmine has no money she could pay him back with a favor.

name: Joanne Koch
description: Dr.Joanne Kochwas the regional director for tech and development and a genetics engineer atBiotechnicainCyberpunk 2077.
