To say that Biotechnica's scientists are "unscrupulous" would be like sayingYorinobu Arasakais "somewhat famous." But few are as unscrupulous as Joanne Koch, even within the organization. Both inside the laboratory, and outside, she holds few, if any reservations about her work. Whether it is using citizens as her personal test subjects, or putting out hits on fellow employees who threaten her position as the regional director for tech and development at Biotechnica, if...

name: Josie Alcazar
description: Josie was the partner ofJames Ito, and had a garage in Woodhaven streetsoutheast Rancho Coronado,Santo Domingo, near the Woodhaven dataterminal. Her remains can be found near a dumpster in a back alley inThe Glen,Heywood. She was shot byTyger Clawsand bled to death. Inspection of her body suggests she belonged to theAldecaldos.

name: Joss Kutcher
description: Joss Kutcheris the sister ofRiver Ward, doing her best to be a single mother to three in harsh conditions ofRed Peaks'Trailer Park, in which she and her familylive. Joss' childhood was not an easy one. Her parents initially owned a farm that didn't succeed in the line of production. To keep business afloat, they managed to open up a small grocery store alongside it. The family of four, Joss, her brother River, and their parents lived on the floor above the store. One night armed robbers broke in looking for money. When they couldn't find anything valueble, they went upstairs and killed Joss'...

name: Journey Ruiz
description: Ruiz is the owner of theTime Machinemusic shop, located on the intersection of Senate and Market Street inThe Glen,Heywood. During the second half of2077, her shop is visited byJohnny SilverhandandSteve Sanchez. The pair of them will leave the shop after having bought one of the more exquisite guitars, kept in the back of the shop, from Journey.

name: Judy Álvarez
description: Judy Álvarezis a skilledbraindancetechieand a member ofthe Mox. She has her ownapartmentin northeasternKabuki,Watson. Judy is a possibleromanceoption forVinCyberpunk 2077. Judy was born on November 27,2052, inLaguna Bend, a small town in the rural outskirts ofNight City. Her father was never around, and her mother died when she was just a child. She still has a photo of her, but can barely remember her mother anymore. Judy was raised instead by her grandparents. Her grandfather was atechieand taught her all that she knows. She also loved to hear the stories he told.Ainara, her grandmother,...

name: Julia Bonet
description: She is approached by an associate ofWeldon Holt, to approach the president of Rancho Coronado Workers United,Ivan Vassiliev, during a union rally behind the Stylishly shop on MLK Boulevard inRancho Coronado,Santo Domingo.She suggests that she acts the part of being a young reporter for theWorld News Serviceand grab Ivan's attention. This meeting would ultimately be Ivan's demise.

name: Juliet Horrigan
description: Juliet lives with her sisterRosein theirfamily homeon Gibson Street,Rancho Coronado,Santo Domingo. In2077, she died at the hands of her sister after a vain attempt to cure her from hercyberpsychosis.

name: Karina Lee
description: Karina Lee is the presenter of her ownNetwork News 54show titled "Chip In", where new technology such as newcyberwareis being promoted. Karina has an upbeat and enthusiastic approach to hosting her show, showing excitement toward the newest cyberware she is presenting. She frequently will have new cyberware implanted into her body in order to demonstrate the positive and negative aspects of the technology.She has reviewed various products from large corporations includingArasaka,Dynalar Technologies,MoorE Technologies,Militech, and others. Karina has made a guest appearance onNight After...

name: Katya Karelina
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Kimiko Sanchez
description: Kissy was part of a mercenary duo withRoxanne Colton, with her being the less experienced and more reckless of the two. Most of their gigs resulted in a massive amount of collateral damages. Both were regulars at theForlorn Hopeand regularly had to be rescued from sticky situations by its patrons. During theFourth Corporate War, Kissy and Roxxie were involved in a battle againstAdam Smasherin a neighbourhood inRancho Coronado. The two of them managed to survive while most of the neighbourhood were killed, giving them a new lease on life. The two of them got married and became more selective...

name: Lana Prince
description: Lana Princeis a character inCyberpunk 2077. The character is modeled after and voiced by Australian video game writer and journalistAlanah Pearce. While looking for a way to leavethe cityand its surroundingwasteland, Prince stumbled across an abandonedThorton Galenaand hoped get it up and running in order to begin her new life. After tinkering with the car and managing to start it back up, the vehicles sent a notification to its former owner, themercenaryV, with its then current location. Upon V's arrival and inspection of their former car, Lana approached, telling them to keep their hands...

name: Laura May
description: Laura is a light skinned woman with brown shoulder-length hair that has been dyed black and brown eyes. She wears large glasses, and has no visiblecyberware. Her outfit is composed of a green sweater with a brown poncho, while her hands are partially concealed by gray finger-less mittens. Laura was ajournalistworking forNetwork 54. After writing a story about the wrong person, she was forced to exit her job. She now works as aJunk Vendorin her own store at theLongshore StacksinDogtown.

name: Lauren Costigan
description: Lauren Costigan is the wife of Bradley Costigan, who after being imprisoned was contacted by theTyger Clawsto shiv Bigs, an informant in a Militech prison, under the orders of Kon Imai. However, Brad refused, so the Tyger Claws kidnapped Lauren to ensure his compliance. Lauren spends at least thirty days in confinement atMonokatana Workshop, having to be put onto nutrient drip after refusing food twice during her captivity. Meanwhile, Brad hiresVto rescue his wife through fixerWakako Okada. After her rescue, Lauren is traumatized by the ordeal, andVadvises her to lay low with a loved one,...

name: Leah Gladen
description: Leah Gladen is aNetrunnerwho stumbled upon theCorpCracker, a device capable of jailbreakingcorporatecyberware. She tries to pawn it over to bothWakako Okadaand theTyger Clawssimultaneously, ultimately deciding to take up the Tyger Claws' offer. She is double crossed by theTyger Clawsand killed in their hideout at theWired Head. WhenVfinds her body at the toilets of the braindance club,Johnny Silverhandwill remark that Gladen deserves aDarwin Awardfor her poor decision-making.

name: Lilayah
description: Lilayahis aRockerboyand a close friend ofTrace Santiago, both whom during theTime of the Redwere part of a group of six edgerunners. She is one of the main characters of theBlack Dogstory fromCyberpunk RED. Like a lot ofRockerboys, Lilayah used to callSeattlehome; that is until she moved toNight City. She sticks to her roots, though, and plays a style she likes to think of as cybergrunge. Her music pays homage to the greats from her hometown but adds in new styles and sensibilities. Always looking for inspiration, Lilayah hangs with a group of edgerunners, sometimes helping them pull jobs....

name: Lina Malina
description: Lina Malina is a woman with green eyes and pink/purple/orange/red gradient dyed hair.She is wearing a pair of rimless round glasses, and has several golden piercings adorning her head, of which are: a circular barbell septum piercing, a left nose ring, a pair of cross earrings and various other ear piercings. Around her neck she wears a silver choker that is decorated with red gemstones, and two golden necklaces of which one has a golden cross. Her outfit consists of an orange/pink/purple gradient ballistic vest with black tiger stripes, that is accessorized with a black shoulder holster...

name: Lisa Smith
description: In September2068,Evan McRayand his coworkers (including Lisa Smith) accessed theCynosure Facilitylocated beneathPacifica,Night City. In2077,Bree Whitneydiscovered information about Evan's research, which eventually brought her toCynosure Site D. With the help of amercenarycalledV, Bree managed to find out an important portion of Evan's work. Depending on V's actions, Bree sold thedatatoNetWatch, causing Lisa's death and the attempted execution against V themselves. On the other hand, if the data was never uncovered, the rest of Evan's team survived.

name: Lizzy Wizzy
description: Elisabeth Wissenfurth,known professionally asLizzy Wizzy, is an artist par excellence and one ofNight City's top celebrities. Her work includes award-winning albums and concert tours, film appearances, and conceptual performance art. Lizzy changes her looks frequently, having a detachable cybernetic jaw and utilizes a full-body replacement in order to become her signature chrome form,includingMidnight Ladyaccessories.As of2077, she lives in theNorth Oaksub-district ofWestbrook, in Night City. Lizzy Wizzy, born Elisabeth Wissenfurth, became a renowned artist and successful celebrity. However,...

name: Louise Nordin Eurodyne
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Lucy Thackery
description: AfterVrescued her from theMaelstrom,Regina Jonessent Lucy toMuamar Reyeswhile her brother Bertie left thecity. Lucy felt she could help more people and did not want to leave yet, so Reyes sent her toOctavio'sclinicin the slums nearCoronado DaminRancho Coronado, as they needed an expert ripperdoc. To keep a low profile, she took the cover name of "Mia."

name: Maggie Isley
description: Isley is a former corporate biological engineer that wentcyberpsychowhen trying to reduce the addictiveness of theScavengers'drugknown asPhantin her self made lab at theOrganitopiaofTerra CognitainDogtown. Maggie's name, profession, and appearance are a reference to the DC comics character Poison Ivy, who's real name is Pamela Isley.

name: Maiko Maeda
description: Maiko Maeda is an associate of theTyger Clawsand works for them as the "unofficial" manager ofClouds. She used to be adollthere, but got promoted. Maiko used to be the output ofJudy Álvarezwhen she worked there. Judy crushed on her hard and Maiko was implied to be borderline manipulative which led to a nasty break up.The two have been estranged and cold to each other ever since, though Maiko stills cares about Judy in some way. The two would reunite when Judy andVsought to emancipate the dolls from Clouds. Maiko refused to comply but gave them the choice to killOswald Forrestfor...

name: Martha Frakes
description: Martha Frakes(disguised asMartha YoungduringHeroes) is the daughter of a6th Streetgang senior member,Nolan Frakes, and the girlfriend of high-rankingValentino,Gustavo Orta. The two groups, being bitter rivals, means that Martha travels under an alias when with her boyfriend. Martha accompanied Gustavo toJackie Welles' funeral, hiding her identity, and disguised as a Valentino, she went by the pseudonym of "Martha Young". At some point following the funeral, Martha was shot in the head and rendered comatose following 6th Street's attempted assassination of Gustavo Orta, who were unaware that...

name: Martha Ling
description: Martha is a proficient boxer and a notable member of theAnimals.She is seen inCyberpunk 2077on posters advertising a pay-per-view fight withLarissa "Guerriera" Almeida.

name: Matilda K. Rose
description: Matilda K. Rose, also known asSasquatch, is the pack leader of a group ofAnimalsinCyberpunk 2077. Matilda has been the alpha animal of her pack since2075.Her expertise includes heavy melee combat and her weapon of choice was an oversized unique sledgehammer by the name ofSasquatch's Hammer, created specifically for her. In 2077, Matilda was known well enough throughoutNight Cityto attract contractors as big asNetWatch. Under their employment, her group of elite fighters settled in theGrand Imperial Mallin thePacificadistrict as private security for agentBryce Mosley. Due to the operation's...

name: Meds Vendor (Corpo Plaza)
description: Her store, named "Old Nature Clinic", can be found on Republic Way inCorpo Plaza,City Center.

name: Meds Vendor (Downtown)
description: Her store can be found on the intersection of Senate Ave & Union Street inDowntown,City Center.

name: Meds Vendor (Little China)
description: Meds Vendor (Little China)is the operator of aMedpointcalledYin & Yang PharmacyinCyberpunk 2077.

name: Meds Vendor (Rocky Ridge)
description: Her store can be found east of theCorp-Bud Railroad StationinRocky Ridge, northernBadlands.

name: Melissa Cruz
description: Melissa Cruz is an employee ofMilitech, aAmericanarms-manufacturingmegacorporation.

name: Melissa Rory
description: Sometime before2069, Melissa had herself implanted with theHigurashi 20-13Mantis Blades, recognized to be of high quality, though with a certain flaw: they interfaced poorly with neural processors and a certain section of the prefrontal cortex. The Higurashi 20-13 line was discontinued in 2069 because of that flaw. On January 102077, Rory was likely driven intocyberpsychosisfrom her implants, and killed 14 people while seriously injuring 4 others. She was a rare case ofMaxTacapprehending a cyberpsycho alive for reconditioning. During the reconditioning, it was revealed that she suffers from...

name: Melissa Wellingham
description: Melissa Wellingham, also known asGodiva, was a character in theCyberpunkuniverse. Godiva is a former Sergeant in the British 22nd SAS regiment. Her unit was wiped out in an IRA ambush. Godiva suspected betrayal, and went snooping around to see what she could find. It turned out that her unit had been sold out by traitorous elements in the British Government. Unfortunately, they caught on to her and turned up the heat. She fled to America, and has been a fixture at the Forlorn Hope since shortly after it opened, tending bar off and on. LikeTrigger, Godiva frequently takes leave to run jobs...

name: Meredith Stout
description: Meredith Stoutis acorpoand the senior operations manager forMilitechinCyberpunk 2077. Meredith Stout worked forMilitechas a senior operations manager.In 2077, a company leak led to a Militech convoy being hijacked by theMaelstromgang and, with the corporation suspecting inside knowledge, tasked Meredith with finding the leak. Shortly after she found evidence leading to her prime suspect,Anthony Gilchrist, who was summarily caught and interrogated by her team. However, Meredith did not receive the information she needed or the right amount of evidence. With her job and life on the line, she...

name: Michiko Sanderson
description: Michiko Sanderson(néeArasaka) (Japanese:荒坂 美知子), is the head of theHatofaction of theArasakacorporation and founder and CEO ofDanger Gal. Unlike the rest of her family and corporation, she allied with theUS governmentafter theFourth Corporate War. Daughter ofKei Arasaka, most of her life was kept secret from the rest of the family, especially her grandfatherSaburo. Born in theUnited States, she held a dual citizenship for bothJapanand the US, however her descent is pure Japanese. She also had access toKenichi Zaburo, one of Arasaka's topsolosand her personal bodyguard since she was four....

name: Miriam Night
description: Miriam Nightwas the founder of the Night Foundation, the CEO ofNight Corp, and the widow ofNight City's founder,Richard Night. Before the construction ofCoronado City, now known as Night City, in the1990s, Miriam met and married an ambitious entrepreneur and businessman by the name ofRichard Night. She was at his side while her husband built the city of his dreams. In 1998 Richard was assassinated, leaving her all his money and possessions, including Richard's own corporation, Night International. A year later in 1999, Miriam restructured her husband's company and founded Night's Foundation,...

name: Misty Olszewski
description: Misty Olszewskiis a new age spiritualist and the owner ofMisty's Esoterica, a store located inUrmland Street,Watson. She is a good friend ofViktor VektorandV, and the girlfriend ofJackie Welles. Although she has family inWarsaw, Misty grew up inNight City'sHeywooddistrict, and was a childhood friend ofJackie Welles.When she was a young adult, Misty opened her own shop onUrmland StreetinLittle China,Watson- calledMisty's Esoterica. At some point she was approached byripperdocViktor Vektor, whom rented a basement she owned, behind her shop, to use as aclinic. Since then both became close...

name: Mower
description: Mower is a member ofMilitechwho suffered from cyberpsychosis after being implanted with military-gradecyberware. She called Dr. Martin Sypura for help, which he confirmed were coming her way, but was instead a hit squad to terminate her. When the hit squad arrived to her location, she killed all of them. At some point, she was caught underRegina Jones's radar, and sentVto incapacitate her. The encounter with Mower takes place in a secluded square arena on Allen street in Kabuki. Upon entering the arena, Mower will immediately place V in a combat state, which can only be reset by leaving the...

name: Nadezhda Tiurina
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Nadia Petrova
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Nadya Papayanova
description: Nadya Papayanova(Надя Папаянова) manages a snuffbraindanceproduction crew out of an electronics plant inArroyo,Santo Domingo. She heldEvelyn Parkerin the facility during theDisasterpiecequest, preparing to sell her to an unknown buyer. She appears in many of theElectric Corporation power plant's emails.

name: Nele Springer
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Nibbles
description: Nibblesis a straycatliving inMegabuilding H10who can potentially becomeV's pet inCyberpunk 2077. In2077,Vfound a bowl in a corridor ofMegabuilding H10alongside ashard. If they decided to leave somecat foodin it, upon returning after a while,Johnny Silverhandappears and comments after observing a cat eating from it. V is then able to interact with the cat, giving her the name "Nibbles", and taking the stray to theirapartment, where Johnny and V observe her relaxing in a laundry basket. From that point on, Nibbles remains a resident in V's H10 apartment and won't appear in any other purchased...

name: Nika Yankovich
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Nina Gutierrez
description: Nina Gutierrezis a character inCyberpunk 2077. She is the former wife of politicianEmilio Gutierrez.

name: Nina Kraviz (Ripperdoc)
description: Nina Kravizis aRipperdocoperating in theWestbrook's luxury residential part ofCharter Hill. She currently works in heruncle's clinic. Nina is an experienced, if not globally-acclaimed Ripperdoc who, in her own words, moves around in the business. Prior to arriving toNight City, she ran shops inIrkutsk,Leningrad,ViennaandGlasgow. Further dialogue reveals that she simply gets bored staying in one place and moves on, which also feeds into her great love of travel. Her uncle was the one to rent her the existing shop in Westbrook for her thirtieth birthday, and she plans on running it up until...

name: Ofelia Sirawian
description: Ofelia is a member of theMaelstromgang, going by the name "Patricia". She warned then-Maelstrom leaderBrickof a member namedRoyce, who she calls a "feral animal", urging Brick to shoot him in the back of his head.In 2077, Patricia acted as contact between Brick andMilitechemployeeAnthony Gilchrist, who started to secretly collaborate with the gang to provide them with details about Militech convoys in order to steal the shipments and get a cut of the profits after selling the goods.Royce would later take over Maelstrom, locking Brick up in a cell. If Brick has been freed duringThe Pickup,...

name: Olga Elisabeth Longmead
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Olivia Garland
description: Prior to theUnification War, Olivia and her brother were police officers at theFifth Precinct, alongside their companionFrank. At some point, Olivia's brother, a detective, was accused after someone planted a corruption charge over him. Frank managed to intervene in order to prevent his companion's expulsion from the force, but unfortunately, Olivia's brother was ultimately demoted to Supply and Facilities Management, a job he ended up hating. By2071, while Frank had left the force, Olivia had been transferred to theNCPD PrecinctinArroyo.

name: Ora Dominguez
description: In the 2070s, Ora Dominguez was a braindance star who had ties to theValentinos. She was with a relationship with a high-ranking Valentino namedEmilio Aguirre. She is also acquainted withFrank, aCombat Cabdriver and formercopand was driven by him to her home inVista del Rey. The following day, Ora led a group of Valentinos to make a deal with6th StreetandJones. However, after seeing her, a shootout took place in which she was killed.

name: Panam Palmer
description: Panam Palmeris introduced as a former member of theAldecaldosnomadclan, who, after a family dispute, decided to live a more independent life as amercenary. She is also a possibleromanceoption forVwith a masculine body inCyberpunk 2077. Panam Palmer was part of the Aldecaldos nomad tribe. Her best friend was captured by theRaffen Shiv, a hostile Nomad group, when they were a child, only to be saved by fellow-AldecaldoCassidy Righter- an incident that deeply affected Panam into her adulthood, to the point of never telling anyone what happened in order to forget about it. Cassidy would remain a...

name: Patricia Gerville
description: Patricia Gerville is a member of6th Street, a gang on a quest to "bring justice" toNight City.

name: Purple Force
description: Purple Force(パープルフォース)is the pseudonym of one of the members of theJapanesegirl groupUs Cracks. AJapanesedescendent born in theNUSA, Purple Force was among the three girls chosen to sign a deal withMSM MediaCorp, who at the time were looking for candidates with the perfect blend of charisma, talent and stage presence in order to complete against the more successfulAIsmaking music - the other two beingRed MenaceandBlue Moon. NamedUs Cracks, the band swiftly became a world sensation.

name: R3n0
description: R3n0 is a netrunner that offersSpellbookfor sale, she is met in theLele ParkduringSpellbound.

name: Rachel Casich
description: In2077, Rachel had heardJoshua Stephenson's story being told in the media and saw an opportunity to exploit it to make a newbraindanceof his experiences. Rachel approached Stephenson in prison and offered him a deal: Stephenson would be released from prison under closeNCPDsupervision and permitted to visit the families of the victims he murdered so that he may try to seek forgiveness. In exchange, Rachel would be permitted to record all of his experiences, including his death by crucifixion and sell it as a high production braindance. Rachel believed that Stephenson was crazy for deciding to...

name: Rebeca Price
description: Rebeca started to run theData Inc. storeinWellsprings, sellingMilitechcyberware, after being blackmailed by theAnimalswho seem to hold one of her relatives hostage. However,Rogue Amendiaresdidn't like Price, taskingVto eliminate her.

name: Red Menace
description: Red Menace(レッドメネース),orAkai Kyōi(赤い脅威), is the pseudonym of one of the members of theJapanesegirl groupUs Cracks. AJapanesedescendent born in theNUSA, Red Menace was among the three girls chosen to sign a deal withMSM MediaCorp, who at the time were looking for candidates with the perfect blend of charisma, talent and stage presence in order to complete against the more successfulAIsmaking music - the other two beingPurple ForceandBlue Moon. NamedUs Cracks, the band swiftly became a world sensation.

name: Regina Jones
description: Regina is a formerMediathat worked for theWorld News Serviceand later forFTF Radio. As a journalist, she also became a mentor toMax Jones.At some point during her muckraking days, Regina needed "help, and fast, too..." and indebted herself to someChineseofficials. It would take her quite some time to pay that debt off.After the radio station was acquired byN54 News, she struck out on her own. Using her extensive network of contacts, Regina quickly made a name for herself as aFixer. At some point, Regina won a uniqueAI-enhanced gun called "Skippy" in a poker game, but it was later stolen from...

name: Rhino
description: In the early to mid2070s, Rhino used to work together with thenetrunnerT-Bug, with whom she would do gigs inCoastview, until one of their gigs involved a client under the protection of theAnimals. TheirFixerghosted them shortly before Animals showed up at their doorstep, demanding to speak with T-Bug and challenge her. In her stead, Rhino volunteered to fight, and won. Now a member of the Animals herself, Rhino is the fist fighting champion ofRancho Coronadoand trains at a formerpaint factory.Vis instructed to fight her in order to become the champion. Rhino boasts that she has never lost a...

name: Rita Wheeler
description: Rita's hairstyle consists of pink-purple hair styled into twin buns. She has long bangs that frame her face. Her skin appears to be synthetic in nature, possibly a variant ofRealSkinn. She wears blue eyeshadow and magenta lipstick, which complement her grayish-green eyes. For clothing, she wears a poorly cropped white tank top with a double gun holster as her outer layer. She pairs it with black latex pants featuring a magenta gradient. Her high heels are integrated into her pants. Rita's arms are fully chromed out with cyberware featuring pink and cyan accents. Spikes adorn her forearms and...

name: Rogue Amendiares
description: Rogue Amendiareswas a well-knownsoloduring the2010sinNight City, who became owner of the famousAfterlifenightclub, and was widely considered the city's bestfixerby2077. Rogue was a rebellious teen, knew stiff hierarchy of gang life was not for her and set out on her own, to become asolo. She was a new and successfulmercenaryinNight City. Rogue also began a relationship with hitrockerboysensationJohnny Silverhand. Rogue on occasion asked Johnny if they could visit adrive-in theatreon a date, which went largely ignored. Her relationship with Johnny ended at some point in2011,after Rogue found...

name: Rosalind Myers
description: Rosalind Myersis the third and current president of theNew United States of America, the former CEO ofMilitech, and a formermarine. Currently serving her third term, Myers is the second woman serving as president in the short history of the NUSA, continuing her gospel of unification. Despite coming from corporate and political backgrounds, Rosalind shows a "commoner" attitude while carrying herself. Thus, as the politician she is, it may be part of the play, as she will do anything to get your vote. However, Myers also reveals her cold-blooded side, not particularly when it's necessary. To...

name: Rose Horrigan
description: Rose lives with her sisterJulietat theirfamily homeon Gibson Street,Rancho Coronado,Santo Domingo. Rose visited ripperdocCharles Buckson several occasions, with work including extensive procedures on both arms, according to theclinic filesin his basement.

name: Roxanne Colton
description: Roxxi was part of a mercenary duo withKimiko Sanchez, with her being the more experienced of the two. Most of their gigs resulted in a massive amount of collateral damages, and while Roxxi pretended to be the more responsible one, usually just as much of the destruction was her fault. Both were regulars at theForlorn Hopeand regularly had to be rescued from sticky situations by its patrons. During theFourth Corporate War, Kissy and Roxxie were involved in a battle againstAdam Smasherin a neighbourhood inRancho Coronado. The two of them managed to survive while most of the neighbourhood were...

name: Roxanne Sumner
description: Sem descrição disponível.

name: Ruby Collins
description: Ruby knewJeremiah Grayson, an operator working forAdam Smasher. After acquiring this knowledge fromCassius Ryder,Johnny Silverhand— controllingV's body — went toEmpathywhere she worked. Once he found Ruby, Johnny bought her a couple of drinks. As the night went on, he managed to get close to her, convincing her to go with him. Outside, Johnny smashed the window of a car and let Ruby drive it. During the drive, Johnny began to fondle her, distracting them both and causing a car accident. The pair survived, and Johnny asked her for Grayson's whereabouts. Still confused, she took a pack of...

name: Ruth Dzeng
description: If there's one thing to know about Ruth it's that she speaks freely. According to her commissioned autobiography, it is revealed that she stepped into the media as a crew assistant through her father's colleague who was aN54 newsshowrunner at the time. Her untied tongue and sense of comedy amused the higher ups, very quickly moving her from behind the camera into the spotlight. Speaking of the current events of Night City as well as the world in a way that is easily agreed with by the public suffering its effects has quickly earned her views and raised her ratings, making her one of the top...

name: Sachiko Kusama
description: Sachiko Kusama was born in Japan. At some point she began working for theArasaka Corporationas one of the medical specialists. She was given a position on the medical research team of theArasaka Orbital Stationand Clinic. As a high ranking employee she reached the peak of her profession when being reassigned to the station, as it was considered an honor and a very rare privilege to become apart of the stations crew.

name: Saki Seo
description: Seo Saki(Japanese: TBD.,Hepburn:Saki Seo) is a character inCyberpunk 2077:Phantom Liberty. Saki is a Asian woman with black hair that is dyed pink and green eyes. Her scalp is adorned with black spiked studs. Around her neck she is wearing a black leather choker with metal studded spikes and a leather string with a fluorescent glow stick. She has a set of red, prostheticcyberwarearms, that are covered by a crimson red leather jacket. Under her jacket, she wears aPUNK tank top. Her outfit is completed withComposite-coated cut-off shorts. Saki is theMeds Vendorat theEBM Petrochem...

name: Samantha Samu
description: Samantha Samu, also known asIsamu, is a member of theTyger ClawsinCyberpunk 2077. In2077, she was tasked—alongside her crew—to take out some dealers by the name of Gakuto and Choki, whom were conducting drug deals on Tyger Claw turf. She and her crew caught both of the underage dealers at a basketball court on Kennedy street, across ofLizzie's Bar, inLittle China,Watson, where they were executed.

name: Sandra Dorsett
description: Sometime around April2077, Sandra was captured byScavengers; herBiomonitormuted by a jammer chip forced into her neuroport, leavingTrauma Teamunaware of her condition.Jackie Welles,T-Bug, andVinfiltrate a Scavenger den to find her floating in an ice-filled bath. V acts quickly to remove the chip and proceeds to lift Sandra from the tub, sending her into cardiac arrest, and forcing the team into a frantic attempt at treatment with an airhypo. In the meantime, Trauma Team arrives to take custody of Sandra, leaving V and Jackie on the balcony of the Scavs' apartment. Eventually Sandra makes a...

name: Sandra Faucet
description: Sandra worked forZetatech, but was fired at once point, unable to pay a dept toBartolomeo Mordelliniwho then askedKajetan Zilevskito neutralize her. She is found dead duringReported Crime: Turn Off the Tap.

name: Skye
description: When investigating the clouds, V is given the option of two dolls, Skye and Angel, each programmed to serve V's exact needs. When V sees Skye in her private room, Skye instead gives the mercenary therapy, comforting them. Skye is calm and empathetic, listening to every word and providing advice. When all dialogue is exhausted, V gives Skye the saveword, breaking her programming. Immediately the doll is confused, becoming mad for being used to get close to Evelyn. After more prodding, Skye divulges where Evelyn's booth is and forces V out, threatening to call security.

name: Song So Mi
description: Song So Mi(송소미), more commonly known by her pseudonymSongbird, is a major character inCyberpunk 2077:Phantom Liberty. Songbird is an exceedingly talentednetrunnerwho works as an intelligence analyst for theNUSA.She is also the right hand of PresidentRosalind Myers. Her talent makes her one of the most valuable assets of the NUSA government to protect the country's precarious position. So Mi is a netrunner ofKoreandescent, with a height of approximately 5'4-5.Her hair color varies on appearance, it's either magenta with orange highlights, or just magenta. She has brown eyes with red eye...

name: Sophia Dupont
description: She has three sons, named Chris, Darius, and Matt. Her sons often perform work for her when having arrangements for gear delivery or retrieval.They also provide security for her emporium. Sophia states she has been in business beforeVwas born, and that her business is as clean asSaburo Arasaka's conscience. AMilitechcorpoby the name of Eliana Zarate was supposed to do business with her, before Eliana got caught byScavengers.

name: Spider Murphy
description: Arabella,going by the nickname ofSpider Murphy, is a skillednetrunnerin theCyberpunkuniverse. Spider Murphy first began Netrunning in 2004, at the age of nine.Her firstCyberdeckwas aHitachi-Radio Shack 95, which she used to hack into aZetatechsales office and falsified an order data to have Zetatech send her a newParraline 5750Acyberdeck. Spider Murphy metRache Bartmossfor the first time after overhearing her Corporate father had wiped his SIN from the system. Having heard of Bartmoss' reputation on the street, she tracked him down and warned him.From that moment on, she got training from...

name: Stella Ramos
description: Stella appears to be a young adult woman of average height. She has black hair cut in a blunt bob, black eyes framed with thick eyebrows, and visible EMP threading on her face. One of her most notable cybernetic implants is her metal-tipped chin. Her outfit consists of an Entropy-style jacket with black and red colors, a pair of denim jeans held up by a buckled belt, as well as a pair of fingerless driving gloves. She wears purple nail polish as well. Stella Ramos is the daughter of Galina Valieva and the older sister ofSasha Yakovleva.She lost her mother because of the side effects...

name: Sue Glover
description: Sue Gloveris a conspiracy theorist and follower ofGary the ProphetinNight City. She can be found inUrmland Street, right next toMisty's Esoterica, inLittle China,Watson. Sue can be found at Gary's alcove, protesting tor the return of Gary after she claims he was abducted by aliens. V has the option of donating to her, she will look at the chip Gary told V to retrieve, telling them to put it away but then elaborated on how Gary was kidnapped, saying he was taken by people with blue eyes in an AV.

name: Susan Abernathy
description: Susan Abernathywas the Director of Special Operations for theArasakaAmerican HQdivision. Abernathy is uncommonly cruel, even by "corpo" standards, betraying or having executed all that oppose her ambitions. Simply mentioning her name to Arasaka's employees will cause them to falter in fear of her paranoid and psychopathic nature. Some time in 2076, Abernathy was promoted to Director of theArasakaSpecial Operations Division, a position coveted by her rival,Arthur Jenkins, andV's direct employer. To gain her position, she had smeared Arthur and the entire Counter Intelligence Division in front...

name: Susanna Mack
description: Susanna is a dark skinned woman with brown hair and brown eyes. Her eyes are surrounded by acyberwaredermal imprint, and her lower lip is adorned with snakebite piercings. Around her neck she is wearing two necklaces, a golden cross with a leather string and a jewel necklace inlaid with a gemstone on a gold string, and a stethoscope. On her right arm she has a singleGorilla Armsimplant that has black knuckles with a golden inlaid. She wears a white tank-top with theTrauma Teamlogo, and pants with a green camouflage pattern. Susanna is a formerTrauma Teammedic who is laying low after a helmet...

name: Susanna Quinn
description: Susanna Quinn, better known asSusie "Q", is a character featured inCyberpunk 2077. Susie "Q" is the leader of theMoxes, a gang of joytoys devoted to "protecting working boys and girls". She runsLizzie's Bar, the gang's main base of operations. Susie takes a different approach to the Mox's leadership, prioritizing the gang's business interests over its history of protecting the vulnerable. She insists the gang's role as protectors and activists is in the past. However, this view is not shared by all of the Mox, with those such asJudy Álvarezcontinuing to give help to those in need. It is...

name: T-Bug
description: In the early to mid2070s, T-Bug used to work together with thesoloRhino, with whom she would do gigs inCoastview. TheirFixerghosted them shortly before Animals showed up at their doorstep, demanding to speak with T-Bug and challenge her. In her stead, Rhino volunteered to fight, and won, joining the Animals as one of their fighters.During this period, T-Bug also helpedDexter DeShawnescapePacificaafter his run-in with theVoodoo Boys. In2077, V and Jackie Welles occasionally work with T-Bug on several minor gigs as they settle into their careers asmercenaries. T-Bug provides vital assistance...

name: Taki Kenmochi
description: Kenmochi is a member of theTyger Claws. She was placed in charge of a pachinko parlor inKabuki,Watson. The dominantFixerof this district,Regina Jones, is afraid the parlor will attract the attention of theNCPDand will stick their nose in Regina's territory. She hiresVto take care of her. They have the option to kill or incapacitate Taki and stuff her in the trunk of one of Regina's cars.

name: Tamara Cosby
description: Cosby is a youngValentinonetrunnerwho was searching for her boyfriend,Lely Hein, who unbeknownst to her was abducted byMaelstrom, forcibly implanted withcyberware, and went cyberpsycho. While looking for Hein, Tamara possibly overdosed in ice bath and froze her finger implants. She asks a man named Tony Ludic for replacements.Later, she overdosed again and stumbled outside, possibly to ask for help. She was found by a homeless man by the name Fred Reid and carried back to his homeless camp.Upon waking up, she fell intocyberpsychosis, and thinking she was being kidnapped slaughtered the entire...

name: Theo Price
description: Theo Priceis a young woman living inMegabuilding H8,Japantown. She found an unexpected friend in the localS.C.S.M.Brendan. Theo can be encountered having friendly exchanges with the AI-like S.C.S.M. next to the staircase of the Megabuilding H8. Their conversations will carry topic from light-hearted chatting, friendly advice, leading all the way to proper therapy sessions, which is something Theo desperately needed as she passed through a dire time in her relationship. Brendan will manage to open her eyes to the situation and encourage her to believe in herself and her own strength more. She...

name: Tracy Phillips
description: Tracy Phillips is found atop a rooftop inThe Glen,HeywoodduringReported Crime: Smoking Kills.

name: Tucker Albach
description: Albach lives in anapartmenton the corner of Scoffield and Sinkyone Street inThe Glen,Heywood. She was formerly the Vice Managing Director of theKiroshi Opticscorporation. At some point in2077, while intoxicated, Albach hit a young girl named Rosita Fuscino with her car, severely wounding her. With no witnesses on the empty street and the collision occurring late at night, she kept on driving, leaving Rosita to slowly die of her injuries which otherwise could have been prevented had she received medical attention in time. With the help ofCCTVfootage, theNCPDwas able to discover that Albach was...
occupation: CorporateVice Managing Director ofKiroshi Optics(formerly)Expert Manager

name: Vortex
description: Vortex was aNetrunnerworking as a dealer and operator for aTyger Clawscasino on Longshore South street inCharter Hill,Westbrook. She reprogrammed the casino's slot machines to skim a small percentage of each winning to go to her own pocket. During a profits check between ranging from January to June 2077, the Tyger Claws found out and unsuccessfully interrogated her about her the missing balance. Following the interrogation, her body was disposed of in the nearby sewers.Following her apparent disappearance,Wakako OkadataskedChang Hoon Namwith finding any trace left behind by her on theNET....

name: Wakako Okada
description: Wakako Okada(Japanese: 岡田 和歌子) is the topfixerof theWestbrookdistrict ofNight City. She can be found at her ownofficeinJapantown. Wakako Okada was born in theKansairegion ofJapan. At some point later, she travelled toNight Citywhere she pursued medicine at theNight City University. It was here where she would meet her first husband,Hiroto Miyamoto. Shortly after graduating, theFourth Corporate Waroccurred. Both Hiroto and she survived. Afterwards, Wakako found herself working forKiroshias amedtech. Wakako balanced her work with her family life, including helping her husband's childhood...

name: Xiaohan Ling
description: Ling is a board member ofKang Tao, aChinesemegacorporationleading theSmartgun market.In2077, she spent one week at theNight CityKonpeki Plaza, which promoted her stay on itsnetsites.

name: Xochi Peralez
description: After hearing the news ofLucius Rhyne's death, she wants to return home and help out with her father's mayoral campaign, as growing up inNight Cityhas taught her that Night City mayors have a habit of leaving their jobs in a coffin. Her mother's only worry is that she may end up becoming a target, and urges that she stays put in Europe.

name: Yawen Packard
description: Yawen Packardis a medical doctor assigned to anNCPD-contracted laboratory inHeywood. Yawen Packard is an acclaimed medical professional specializing in neuroscience. She is currently working in the field of pediatric autism, augmenting children's brain waves withbraindancetechnology. Due to the specific nature of accessing thoughts and memories that would otherwise be locked out, the NCPD contracted her lab to help with the investigation of thePeter Pan case, wherethe suspectsuffered a bullet wound and ended up in a coma prior to being able to reveal any information regarding his victims. Her...

name: Yishen Rhee
description: Yishen Rheewas aMercenaryinCyberpunk. She made her first appearance in theCyberpunk 2077: Your Voicecomic, and appeared during themain jobNever Fade AwayinCyberpunk 2077. Yishen Rhee was a member of theRed WillowNomadsbefore moving toNight City. Sometime before2013, Rhee andJohnny Silverhandhad a falling out for an unknown reason after an event Silverhand assumed she "didn't like the last time". In April 2013, Rhee was at theClub Atlantisat the same time as Johnny Silverhand was searching forRogue Amendiares. Having trouble getting something out of a vending machine, she asked Silverhand to...

name: Yoko Tsuru
description: Yoko Tsuruis a vendor working at theKabuki RoundaboutEdgeNet shop located in theKabukisub-district ofWatson. During the job given to V by T-Bug, she will tellVthat she has been holding on toa daemonfor them that should work on any third-gencyberdeck. She remarks that there is an available access point available to test it out. When returning to her any time afterthe Konpeki Plaza heist, she will make remarks about T-Bugs passing and that she was found inside her apartment. name: Zaria Hughes
description: Zaria Hughes is a member ofMaelstrom, who participated in a cult ritual which left her a cyberpsycho. This ritual involved staying connected tothe Netwhile she was close to death, however this process destroyed whatever sanity she had left. Vfinds Zaria in an icebox, filled with severed body parts and surrounded by dead Maelstrom cultists. After investigating the area and speaking to the final, dying cultist, Zaria awakens and tries to take V out. She is fast and stealthy, usingmantis bladesandoptical camoto attack in close quarters.

name: Zoe Alonzo
description: Alonzo is wanted by theNCPDfor extortion, kidnapping, first degree murder, and multiple robberies. Depending onV's actions, Alonzo can meet her demise during anorganized crime activityinThe Glen,Heywood.

name: Zoli Barnes
description: In2077it is revealed she was most likely pushed onto the tracks atMemorial Park Station, which was then covered up byMilitech. She was investigatingBrad Noorwood, a Militech ally on theNight City Council, and his connection to aBiotechnicapoisoning of a townwhich was linked to studies done for Militech.

name: Zuleikha El-Ahmar
description: Zuleikha El-Amar lived with her mother,Gloria El-Ahmarand her brother, Ruben El-Ahmar at their house inRancho Coronado,Santo Domingo,Night City. Her family are all followers of theCoptic Orthodox Church. In2065, Zuleikha's brother Ruben was shot and killed byJoshua Stephenson. Stephenson was arrested and convicted of the murder and sentenced to serve time inNight City Prison, but the El-Ahmar family were left devastated by the loss. Zuleikha, turning to her Reverend Stephanos Nasso for guidance, decided that the best way to heal from the pain of her loss was to extend her love and forgiveness...

name: 1R-0NC-LAD
description: Inside theEBM Petrochem Stadium, there will be a green shipping crate located near and above theAutofixerterminal, where sparks can be seen inside it. Inside will be a damaged combat robot which is the source of the sparks. Accessing the laptop beside the robot will add 1R-0NC-LAD as a new contact, and it will then begin to sendVon a scavenger hunt throughout the EBM Petrochem Stadium for "Robot Software". 1R-0NC-LAD will give out photos that show the location of the Software it needs, which will be contained inside white containers. V must glean clues on where the containers are from the...

name: Aguilar Nubiola
description: Aguilar is a legendary mercenary affiliated with the Cuban cartels, known to have a high body count in assassinations around the world. They are well acquainted with the power structure ofDogtown, and have close ties withBarghest, especially duringKurt Hansen's reign.

description: Barry Lewisis an officer of theNCPDresiding in hisapartmentinH10 megabuilding,Little China,Watson. 2077 has been a tough year for Barry, dealing with the increased rate of crime following the mayor's death and colleagues that simply having no further depth than job efficacy. Sure, Barry wants to do the right thing and help the people ofNight City, but that's somewhat difficult when every crazed gangoon or murderous corpo that gets into trouble with the law seems to be deep in the pockets of someone who can make their crimes go away with a simple transfer of eddies to the chief's wallet, or...

name: Paradox
description: One of the longest running underground screamsheets before theFourth Corporate War, Doctor Paradox's Mysteries printed or displayed as a collection of barely coherent rantings, post-modern poetry, and purposefully disturbing images designed to "shake up the masses." By2020, Paradox began heavily promoting otherwise baseless conspiracy theories, including a government plot to utilize anArtificial intelligenceto turn the population into zombies. Paradox believedPresident Elizabeth Kressto be an Artificial Intelligence herself, using a brainwashed actor to present a human face to the public when...

description: Phil Hernandez, also known asNachois afixermentioned inCyberpunk 2020andCyberpunk 2077

name: Ryan Baxter
description: After pulling off a theft of 7170eurodollarsfrom an unnamedCorporatelocation inDowntown, Ryan Baxter went on the run.Soloshired by the corpo would use Cason Hess to message Baxter into revealing his location; however the former would not play along.Ryan would later run into car trouble atLaguna Bend Reservoirafter hisColby's engine overheated.

name: Skippy
description: A weapon that's easy to fall in love with, but difficult to trust. "It" speaks to the user using its unique weaponAI.Regina Joneswon Skippy in a poker game from atechiecalled "Danish." It was later stolen from her and eventually ended up lying next to a corpse in a back alley. It should be noted that even though Skippy says that he will "aim exclusively at the head" in Stone Cold Killer mode, the reality is that when V is aiming, the target lock will be at the heads of the enemies; However hip firing will still result in a target lock on the limbs, thus allowing Stone Cold Killer mode to be...

name: V (character)
description: V, an alias forValerie/Vincent,is amercenaryinvolved in a series of singular events during the year2077, which toppled the balance of power inNight City. V is the playable protagonist ofCyberpunk 2077. Their gender, appearance, voice, attributes, perks, andLifepathsare all customizable and have an impact on the storyline. Thecharacter customization systemprocess starts with the player either selecting a preset character or creating a custom one. When customizing the character, the player can select a gender and then customize the rest of the character, which can include depictions of breasts...

name: Xiu Lian
description: Xiu Lian(Chinese: 秀莲,Xiù Lián/Japanese: シウ・リアン,Shiu Rian) is a character featured inCyberpunk 2077.

description: Yuan Huo is an employee ofKang Tao, aChinesemegacorporationleading the smart gun market.
